Yunnan
云南

Pop 47.705 million
人口 4770.5 万

Why Go?
为什么要去？

Yunnan (云南, Yúnnán) is the most diverse province in all China, both in its extraordinary mix of peoples and in the splendour of its landscapes. That combination of superlative sights and many different ethnic groups has made Yunnan the trendiest destination for China’s exploding domestic tourist industry.
云南（ 云南 ，云南）是全中国最多元化的省份，无论是其非凡的民族组合还是其壮丽的风景。这种最高级的景点和许多不同民族的结合使云南成为中国国内旅游业爆炸式增长的最时尚目的地。

More than half of the country’s minority groups reside here, providing a glimpse into China’s hugely varied mix of humanity. Then there’s the eye-catching contrasts of the land itself: dense jungle sliced by the Mekong River in the far south; soul-recharging glimpses of the sunset over rice terraces in the southeastern regions; snowcapped mountains as you edge towards Tibet.
中国一半以上的少数民族居住在这里，让我们得以一窥中国千差万别的人性。然后是这片土地本身引人注目的对比：最南端被湄公河切割成一块茂密的丛林;东南地区水稻梯田上的日落令人心灵充电;白雪皑皑的山脉，向西藏渐行渐进。

Infrastructure development makes travel here easier than ever, but you’ll need time to see it all – whatever time you’ve set aside for Yunnan, double it.
基础设施的发展使这里的旅行比以往任何时候都更容易，但您需要时间才能看到这一切——无论您为云南留出什么时间，都要加倍。

When to Go
何时去

Apr & May Look for wildflower blooms offset by the brilliant white of snow-covered peaks.
4 月和 5 月寻找野花盛开，与白雪覆盖的山峰的亮白色相抵消。

Jul & Aug Head for mountains and glaciers around Deqin for prime hiking.
7 月 & 8 月前往德钦周围的山脉和冰川，进行主要徒步旅行。

Dec & Jan Escape China’s winter in Kunming, the city of eternal spring, or further south in Xishuangbanna.
12 月和 1 月在永春之城昆明或更南的西双版纳逃离中国的冬天。

Yunnan Highlights
云南亮点

1 Yuanyang Rice Terraces Catching a magical sunrise or sunset at this incredible synthesis of natural beauty and constructed innovation.
1 元阳梯田 在这个令人难以置信的自然美景和建筑创新的结合中捕捉神奇的日出或日落。

2 Yubeng Hiking to mountain lakes and waterfalls from a quaint Tibetan village in the shadow of Kawa Karpo.
2 Yubeng 从卡瓦噶波阴影下古色古香的藏族村庄徒步前往高山湖泊和瀑布。

3 Nuodeng Stepping off the tourist trail in this delightful ancient hillside village.
3 诺登 在这个令人愉快的古老山坡村庄的旅游路线上走出来。

4 Shaxi Exploring the ancient Tea Horse Road from the heart of an attractive historic village.
4 沙溪 从迷人的历史村庄中心探索古老的茶马路。

5 Bingzhongluo Heading towards the edges of the map in this village in the remote Nujiang Valley.
5 冰中罗 朝着偏远怒江谷这个村庄的地图边缘走去。

6 Jianshui Enjoying classic architecture in a mixture of styles (and great barbecue).
6 建水 享受风格混合的经典建筑（和很棒的烧烤）。

7 Lugu Lake Lazing around the shores of this stunning lake – or punting about in a dugout canoe.
7 泸沽湖 在这个迷人的湖岸边慵懒地闲逛，或者乘坐独木舟四处划船。

History
历史

With its remote location, harsh terrain and diverse ethnic make-up, Yunnan was once considered a backward place populated by barbarians.
云南地处偏远，地形恶劣，民族构成多样，一度被认为是一个落后的地方，蛮族聚居。

The early Han emperors held tentative imperial power over the southwest and forged southern Silk Road trade routes to Myanmar (Burma). From the 7th to mid-13th centuries, though, two independent kingdoms, the Nanzhao and Dali, ruled and dominated the trade routes from China to India and Myanmar. It wasn’t until the Mongols swept through that the southwest was integrated into the Chinese empire as Yunnan. Even so, it remained an isolated frontier region, more closely aligned with Southeast Asia than China.
汉朝早期皇帝在西南地区掌握了暂定的皇权，并开辟了通往缅甸（缅甸）的丝绸之路贸易路线。然而，从 7 世纪到 13 世纪中叶，两个独立的王国南诏和大理统治并主导了从中国到印度和缅甸的贸易路线。直到蒙古人席卷而来，西南地区才被并入中华帝国，成为云南。即便如此，它仍然是一个与世隔绝的边疆地区，与东南亚的联系比与中国更紧密。

Today, Yunnan is still a strategic jumping-off point to China’s neighbours. Despite its geographical isolation, much of the province has modernised rapidly in recent years.
今天，云南仍然是中国邻国的战略起点。尽管地理上与世隔绝，但该省的大部分地区近年来已经迅速现代化。

Language
语言

Many different dialects are spoken in Yunnan. Most belong either to the Tibeto-Burman family (eg the Naxi language) or the SinoTibetan family (eg the Lisu language).
云南语使用许多不同的方言。大多数属于藏缅语系（例如纳西语）或汉藏语系（例如傈僳语）。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

AIR
空气

Kunming’s airport is the sixth-busiest in China, handling over 47 million passengers per year. There are daily flights to most major cities, as well as to an increasing number of international destinations. Lijiang is well connected to a number of cities in China and internationally, while Dali, Shangri-la and Jinghong have surprisingly good connections within China.
昆明机场是中国第六繁忙的机场，每年接待超过 4700 万名旅客。每天都有航班飞往大多数主要城市，以及越来越多的国际目的地。丽江与中国和国际上的许多城市有着良好的联系，而大理、香格里拉和景洪在中国境内的联系却出奇地好。

BOAT
船

One adventurous route out of Yunnan in the past was to travel down the Mekong by cargo boat from Jinghong to northern Thailand. Recent security threats have put off most passengers, but it is still possible to hitch a ride.
过去，离开云南的一条冒险路线是乘坐货船从景洪沿湄公河顺流而下，前往泰国北部。最近的安全威胁让大多数乘客望而却步，但仍然可以搭便车。

ROAD
路

Expressways link Kunming with Dali, east to Guizhou and Guangxi, southwest past Baoshan to Ruili and past Jinghong to the Laos border. An expressway is also being built from Kunming to Hekou on the Vietnam border and beyond to Hanoi. To remote destinations within Yunnan, bus is still often the only way in or out.
高速公路连接昆明和大理，东至贵州和广西，西南经过宝山至瑞丽，经景洪至老挝边境。一条从昆明到越南边境河口以及河内的高速公路也正在建设中。前往云南境内的偏远目的地，巴士往往是进出的唯一途径。

TRAIN
火车

Railways link Yunnan to Guizhou, Guangxi, Sichuan and beyond. In Yunnan itself development of the railways has been slower than elsewhere in China due to difficult topography, but the region is finally catching up to the rest of the country and more rail lines are currently under development. The main route for travellers is the line from Kunming to Dali and Lijiang, which will soon continue on to Shangri-la. Also in the works are rail links with Ruili, Xishuangbanna, and international extensions into Laos and on to Thailand.
铁路将云南与贵州、广西、四川等地连接起来。在云南，由于地形困难，铁路的发展速度比中国其他地方慢，但该地区终于赶上了全国其他地区，目前正在开发更多的铁路线。旅客的主要路线是从昆明到大理和丽江的线路，该线路很快将继续前往香格里拉。此外，还有与瑞丽、西双版纳的铁路连接，以及通往老挝和泰国的国际延伸线。

Central Yunnan
滇中地区

Central Yunnan covers a big swathe of land, including key destinations such as the capital Kunming, old-school travellers favourite Dali, and the surrounding Erhai Lake and mountains of Cang Shan, as well as the legendary rice terraces of Yuanyang, perhaps Yunnan’s finest photo opportunity.
云南中部占地广阔，包括首府昆明、老派游客最爱的大理、周围的洱海和沧山山脉等主要目的地，以及传说中的鸳鸯梯田，也许是云南最好的拍照机会。

But central Yunnan is also where you’ll find some of the region’s least visited highlights: the former Tea Horse Road caravan oasis of Shaxi, the ancient Bai village of Nuodeng and the historic old towns of Jianshui and Weishan, whose streets are lined with wooden houses, courtyard homes, temples and drum and bell towers.
但云南中部也是该地区一些游客最少的亮点：沙溪前茶马路商队绿洲、诺登古白村以及历史悠久的建水和渭山老城区，街道两旁林立着木屋、四合院、寺庙、鼓楼和钟楼。

Kunming 昆明
Kunming 昆明

%0871 / Pop 6.6 million
% 0871 / 人口 660 万

Kunming (Kūnmíng) has long been known as one of China’s most liveable cities. Known as the ‘Spring City’ for its equable climate, it remains a very pleasant place to kick back for a few days. For visitors who haven’t succumbed to the laid-back attitude of the place, there are plenty of temples and national parks nearby to keep you busy during the day and a fair few craft breweries and cool bars to hold your attention at night.
昆明（Kūnmíng）长期以来一直被誉为中国最宜居的城市之一。它因其宜人的气候而被称为“春天之城”，仍然是一个非常宜人的地方，可以放松几天。对于没有屈服于这个地方悠闲态度的游客来说，附近有许多寺庙和国家公园，让您白天忙碌起来，晚上还有相当多的精酿啤酒厂和凉爽的酒吧可以吸引您的注意力。

Of course, like other Chinese cities, the face of Kunming is constantly changing and most old neighbourhoods have been torn down to make way for shopping malls and towering new residential complexes. Traffic jams, unknown even a few years ago, are now a common occurrence. Yet the essentially easy-going nature of Kunming is, thankfully, still the same.
当然，与其他中国城市一样，昆明的面貌也在不断变化，大多数老街区都被拆除，为购物中心和高耸的新住宅区让路。交通拥堵，几年前还不为人知，现在已经司空见惯了。然而，值得庆幸的是，昆明本质上随和的本质仍然是一样的。

History
历史

The region of Kunming has been inhabited for 2000 years, but it wasn’t until WWII that the city really began to expand, when factories were established and refugees, fleeing from the Japanese, started to pour in from eastern China. As the end point of the famous Burma Road, a 1000km-long haul from Lashio in Myanmar, the city played a key role in the Sino-Japanese War. Renmin Xilu marks the tail end of the road.
昆明地区已经有人居住了 2000 年，但直到二战期间，这座城市才真正开始扩张，当时工厂建成，逃离日本人的难民开始从中国东部涌入。作为著名的缅甸公路的终点，这条公路从缅甸腊戌出发，全长1000公里，在甲午战争中发挥了关键作用。人民西路标志着这条路的尾端。

After the war, the city returned to being overlooked and isolated. When China opened to the West, however, tourists noticed the province, and Kunming used its gateway status to the rest of Yunnan to become one of the loveliest cities in southwest China.
战后，这座城市又回到了被忽视和孤立的状态。然而，当中国向西方开放时，游客注意到了这个省，昆明利用其通往云南其他地区的门户地位，成为中国西南部最美丽的城市之一。

Now, as Beijing looks to boost China’s already significant economic presence in Southeast Asia, new transport routes south from Kunming are being constructed. In particular, work has finally started on the long-touted high-speed railway designed to link Kunming with Vientiane in Laos and Bangkok in Thailand. In the not-too-distant future, maybe as early as 2021, travellers will be able to jump on a train in Kunming and arrive in Vientiane the same day.
现在，随着北京希望提升中国在东南亚已经很重要的经济影响力，昆明向南的新运输路线正在建设中。特别是，长期吹捧的高速铁路终于开始动工，该铁路旨在连接昆明与老挝万象和泰国曼谷。在不远的将来，也许最早在2021年，旅客就可以在昆明跳上火车，当天到达万象。

1Sights
1 景点

oGolden TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
o 金庙 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map; 金殿风景名胜区, Jīndiàn Fēngjǐng Míngshèngqū; %871 6501 4511; Chuanjin Lu, 穿金路; ¥25; h7.30am-6pm)
（ 地图 ; 金殿风景名胜区 ， Jīndiàn Fēngjǐng Míngshèngqū; % 871 6501 4511;Chuanjin Lu， 穿金路 ; ¥25; h 上午 7.30 至下午 6 点）

The Golden Temple Scenic Area is equal parts religious space, forest park, botanical garden and open-air sculpture museum; it covers 118 hectares on the northwestern outskirts of the city. The obvious highlight is the namesake Qing dynasty shrine, the largest bronze temple in China, which shines magnificently under the bright Yunnan sun.
金庙景区集宗教空间、森林公园、植物园和露天雕塑博物馆于一体;它占地 118 公顷，位于城市西北郊区。最明显的亮点是同名的清代祠堂，中国最大的青铜寺庙，在云南灿烂的阳光下熠熠生辉。

Numerous buses from the centre stop out front, or take the metro to the North Bus Station and transfer to Bus 57.
从市中心出发的许多巴士停靠在前面，或乘坐地铁到北巴士站，然后换乘 57 路公交车。

Dounan Flower MarketMARKET
斗南花卉市场 MARKET

(斗南花市, Dòunán Huāshì; Chenggongqu Xianhua Dadao, 呈贡区鲜花大道; h8am-6pm; mDounan)
（ 斗南花市 ，Dòunán Huāshì;呈贡区鲜花大道 h 8am-6pm; m 斗南）

China’s largest flower market is a riot of colours and smells, and a charming place to wander for an hour and see the diversity of species on offer. Try to get here early, when the morning auctions are happening, for the most action.
中国最大的花卉市场色彩缤纷，气味缤纷，是一个迷人的地方，可以漫步一个小时，欣赏各种物种。尽量早点到达这里，当早上的拍卖会发生时，以获得最多的行动。

From Metro Line 1’s Dounan station, walk southwest a little over 1km. Most days you’ll be able to follow the crowd.
从地铁1号线斗南站向西南方向步行1公里多一点。大多数时候，您将能够跟随人群。

Yunnan Provincial MuseumMUSEUM
云南省博物馆 MUSEUM

(map; 云南省博物馆, Yúnnán Shěng Bówùguǎn; %871 6728 6223; www.ynmuseum.org; 6393 Guangfu Lu, 广福路6393号; h9am-5pm Tue-Sun) F
（ 地图 ; 云南省博物馆 ，Yúnnán Shěng Bówùguǎn; % 871 6728 6223;www.ynmuseum.org; 广福路 6393 号 h 周二至周日上午 9 时至下午 5 时） F

Originally built in 1951, this museum’s relocation in 2015 gave it a thoroughly modern 60,000 square metres of exhibition space. Displays span the prehistoric to the present day; expect a broad overview of Yunnan’s past through well-curated exhibitions, though English captions are at times frustratingly limited. Enter on the southeast side of the building, and visit the quality on-site cafe for a coffee or tea if you find your feet dragging. Free baggage storage is also available.
这座博物馆始建于 1951 年，于 2015 年搬迁，拥有 60,000 平方米的完全现代化的展览空间。展览跨越史前至今;通过精心策划的展览，您可以全面了解云南的过去，尽管英文字幕有时非常有限，令人沮丧。从大楼的东南侧进入，如果您发现脚步拖沓，可以前往酒店内的优质咖啡馆喝杯咖啡或茶。酒店还提供免费行李寄存服务。

From Metro Line 1’s Erji Road station, catch Bus 169 and ride for six stops. You can also get here directly from the Yunnan Nationalities Museum, though Bus 165 covers the 20 intervening stations in an agonisingly slow hour of traffic.
从地铁1号线的二吉路站出发，乘坐169路公交车，乘坐六站。您也可以直接从云南民族博物馆到达这里，尽管 165 路公交车在交通缓慢的小时内覆盖了 20 个中间车站。

Green Lake ParkPARK
绿湖公园 PARK

(map Google map; 翠湖公园, Cuìhú Gōngyuán; %871 6531 8808; 67 Cuihu Nanlu, 翠湖南路67号; h6am-10pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 翠湖公园 ，Cuìhú Gōngyuán; % 871 6531 8808; 翠湖南路翠湖路 67 号 h 6am-10pm） F

Come here to people-watch, practise taichi or just hang with the locals and stroll through winding lines that meander through the 22 hectares of ponds and pavilions. The roads surrounding the park are lined with wannabe trendy cafes, teahouses and shops. In November, everyone in the city awaits the return of the local favourites: red-beaked seagulls. It’s a treat watching people, er, ‘flock’ to the park when the first one shows up.
来这里观察人群、练习太极拳，或者只是与当地人一起闲逛，漫步在蜿蜒穿过 22 公顷的池塘和凉亭的蜿蜒线路中。公园周围的道路两旁林立着想成为时尚咖啡馆、茶馆和商店的商店。11 月，这座城市的每个人都在等待当地人的最爱：红喙海鸥的回归。当第一个出现时，看着人们，呃，“涌向”公园，这是一种享受。

Yuantong TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
圆通寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map Google map; 圆通禅寺, Yuántōng Chán Sì; %871 6519 3762; 42 Yuantong Jie, 圆通街42号; ¥6; h8am-5.20pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 圆通禅寺 ，Yuántōng Chán Sì; % 871 6519 3762; 圆通街圆通街 42 号 ; ¥6; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点 20 分）

This Zen Buddhist temple is the largest Buddhist complex in Kunming and a popular draw for both pilgrims and locals. It’s more than 1200 years old, but has been refurbished many times. To the rear, a hall has been added with a statue of Sakyamuni, a gift from Thailand’s king.
这座禅宗寺庙是昆明最大的佛教建筑群，深受朝圣者和当地人的欢迎。它已有 1200 多年的历史，但经过多次翻新。在后面，增加了一个大厅，里面有一尊释迦牟尼雕像，这是泰国国王的礼物。

Confucian TempleCONFUCIAN TEMPLE
孔庙 CONFUCIAN TEMPLE

(map Google map; 文庙, Wén Miào; 96 Renmin Zhonglu, 人民中路96号; h7.30am-6pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 文庙 ，Wén Miào;人民中路 96 号 h 7.30am-6pm） F

Originally built in 1276 and completely rebuilt to current form in 1690, after decades of neglect Kunming’s Confucian Temple has undergone extensive renovations in the last 50 years. It serves as a sort of community centre for locals practising taichi, taking classes or just playing cards and gossiping. It’s one of the best spots in the city for people-watching.
昆明文庙始建于 1276 年，1690 年完全重建为现在的形式，经过数十年的忽视，在过去的 50 年里经历了大规模的整修。它是一种社区中心，供当地人练习太极拳、上课或只是打牌和闲聊。它是该市观看人群的最佳地点之一。

Kunming MuseumMUSEUM
昆明博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 昆明市博物馆, Kūnmíngshì Bówùguǎn; %871 6315 3359; www.kmmuseum.com; 93 Tuodong Lu, 拓东路93号; h9.30am-5pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 昆明市博物馆 ，Kūnmíngshì Bówùguǎn; % 871 6315 3359;www.kmmuseum.com;拓东路拓东路 93 号 h 93 9.30am-5pm） F

While the centrepiece of the museum is the Dharani Pillar, a 6.7m carved stone pillar from the Kingdom of Dali, exhibitions range through a strong focus on WWII history and an interesting collection of porcelain, as well as numerous rotating temporary exhibitions. English captions aren’t always widely available, but it’s still a diverting series of displays.
虽然博物馆的核心是达拉尼柱，这是一根来自大理王国的 6.7 米雕刻石柱，但展览范围包括重点关注二战历史和有趣的瓷器收藏，以及众多轮换的临时展览。英文字幕并不总是广泛可用，但它仍然是一系列转移注意力的显示方式。

Zhenqing TempleTAOIST TEMPLE
真清寺道观

(map Google map; 真庆观, Zhēnqìng guān; %871 6312 5250; 82 Tuodong Lu, 拓东路82号; h8am-5.30pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 真庆观 ，Zhēnqìng guān; % 871 6312 5250; 拓东路拓东路 82 号 82am-5.30pm h ） F

Dwarfed by the surrounding tower blocks, this quaint Taoist temple is an island of calm in the midst of the city. The compound has expanded significantly since first built, but the original construction dates to the Ming Dynasty in 1419.
这座古色古香的道观与周围的塔楼相比相形见绌，是城市中的一座宁静之岛。自建成以来，该大院已大幅扩建，但最初的建筑可以追溯到 1419 年的明朝。

Yunnan Nationalities MuseumMUSEUM
云南民族博物馆 MUSEUM

(map; 云南民族博物馆, Yúnnán Mínzú Bówùguǎn; %871 6431 1385; 1503 Dianchi Lu, 滇池路1503号; h9am-4.30pm Tue-Sun) F

On the northeast corner of Diān Chí, the Yunnan Nationalities Museum is reputedly the largest minorities museum in China. The ground-floor exhibition of local cultures, customs and costumes is comprehensive and comes with proper English captions.
云南民族博物馆位于点芝的东北角，据说是中国最大的少数民族博物馆。一楼的当地文化、习俗和服饰展览内容全面，并配有适当的英文字幕。

To get here catch Bus A1 from the city centre, or from Kunming Railway Station catch Bus 24 or 44.
要到达这里，从市中心乘坐 A1 公交车，或从昆明火车站乘坐 24 路或 44 路公交车。

Don’t confuse this with the Yunnan Nationalities Village across the street, a large park with reconstructions of ‘traditional’ villages of 26 of Yunnan’s minority groups, which some visitors will find objectionable on account of elephant performances and the general theme-park atmosphere.
不要将其与街对面的云南民族村混淆，这是一个大型公园，重建了云南 26 个少数民族的“传统”村庄，一些游客会因为大象表演和主题公园的整体氛围而感到反感。

East PagodaPAGODA
东塔宝塔

(map Google map; 东寺塔, Dōngsì Tǎ; %871 6810 6361; 63 Shulin Jie, 书林街63号; h9am-5pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 东寺塔 ，东寺寺 ; % 871 6810 6361; 书林街 63 h 号 9am-5pm） F

The East Pagoda is a Tang structure that was, according to Chinese sources, destroyed by an earthquake (western ones say it was destroyed by the Muslim revolt in the mid-19th century) and renovated as recently as 1983. The small surrounding park is a hang-out for senior citizens.
东塔是一座唐代建筑，据中国资料称，它被地震摧毁（西方人说它是在 19 世纪中叶被穆斯林起义摧毁的），最近在 1983 年进行了翻修。周围的小公园是老年人的聚会场所。

WORTH A TRIP
值得一游

THE STONE FOREST
石林

Inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage list in 2007 as part of the South China Karst, Kunming’s Stone Forest Scenic Area (石林风景区, Shílín Fēngjǐngqū; %871 6771 1439; Shilin Yizu Autonomous County, 石林彝族自治县; adult/child ¥130/65; hsunrise-sunset) is undeniably beautiful – but extremely popular with tour groups and independent travellers alike. It’s worth the cost and trip from Kunming, but plan to spend most of the day exploring the outlying pathways of the park. Or else skip the scenic area entirely and wander the surrounding country (which is, after all, the same landscape without the ticket cost).
2007 年被联合国教科文组织列入世界遗产名录，作为华南喀斯特的一部分，昆明石林风景区 （ 石林风景区 ; % 871 6771 1439;石林彝族自治县石林彝族自治县 ;成人/儿童¥130/65; h 日出-日落） 无疑是美丽的，但非常受旅行团和独立旅行者的欢迎。从昆明出发的费用和旅行是值得的，但计划花一天的大部分时间探索公园的偏远小径。或者完全跳过风景区，在周围的国家闲逛（毕竟，没有门票费用，这是相同的风景）。

During the July/August torch festival, activities like wrestling, bullfighting, singing and dancing are held at a natural outdoor amphitheatre by Hidden Lake, south of Shilin.
在7月/8月的火炬节期间，士林以南隐湖旁的天然户外圆形剧场会举行摔跤、斗牛、唱歌和跳舞等活动。

At the bus station are a handful of fast-food joints if you haven’t brought snacks. Check all prices before you order, as overcharging is not uncommon.
如果你没有带零食，在公交车站有几家快餐店。订购前检查所有价格，因为多收费用并不少见。

Four daily buses leave from Kunming’s East Station (¥34, 1½ hours, 9am, 10.30am, 12pm, 5.30pm) for the Stone Forest Scenic Area. Buses and minibuses return roughly hourly from the Scenic Area until 6pm. From the Stone Forest Bus Station to the scenic area entrance, a 3km trip, electric carts charge ¥25 each way.
每天有四班巴士从昆明东站出发（34日元，1小时，上午9点、上午10点30分、中午12点、下午5点30分）前往石林景区。巴士和小巴大约每小时从景区返回，直到下午 6 点。从石林公交站到景区入口，全程3公里，电动推车单程收费¥25。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Some of the best hostels and guesthouses in all Yunnan can be found in Kunming, as well as the full range of budget, midrange and luxury hotels. Many are dotted around Green Lake Park and the surrounding area, which is a convenient central location for sightseeing (if poorly connected to transit options), while the cheapest places are in the streets north of the train station.
昆明拥有云南最好的旅馆和宾馆，以及各种经济型、中档和豪华型酒店。许多地方散布在绿湖公园及周边地区，这是一个方便的观光中心位置（如果交通选择不畅），而最便宜的地方则在火车站以北的街道上。

oLost Garden GuesthouseGUESTHOUSE¥¥
o 失落花园宾馆 GUESTHOUSE¥¥

(map Google map; 一丘田七号客栈, Yīqiū Tiánqīhào Kèzhàn; %871 6511 1127; www.lostgardenguesthouse.com; 7 Yiqiu Tian, 一丘田7号; dm/r ¥60/200; naiW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 一丘田七号客栈 ， Yīqiū Tiánqīhào Kèzhàn; % 871 6511 1127;www.lostgardenguesthouse.com;7 Yiqiu Tian， 一丘田 7 号 ;dm/r ¥60/200; n a i W ）

Tucked in the side streets off Green Lake, this oasis amid white-brick apartment blocks has nouveau Dali decor with wood furniture, antiques and a pleasant lounge. Rooms are spread across two adjoining buildings. It’s tricky to locate: start by following the alley to the right of Green Lake Hotel, then take the first left and look for the sign pointing left.
这片绿洲隐藏在绿湖（Green Lake）附近的小街上，坐落在白砖公寓楼中，拥有新达利风格的装饰，配有木制家具、古董和宜人的休息室。客房分布在两栋相邻的建筑中。很难找到：首先沿着绿湖酒店右侧的小巷走，然后在第一个左转，寻找指向左侧的标志。

Ask for a room towards the back as there’s a noisy school across the road.
要一个靠近后面的房间，因为马路对面有一所嘈杂的学校。

They also serve a decent coffee and breakfast from 8am, one of the earliest options for western breakfast in the centre.
他们还从早上 8 点开始提供体面的咖啡和早餐，这是市中心最早的西式早餐选择之一。

oKunming Upland Youth HostelHOSTEL¥¥
o 昆明高原青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥¥

(map Google map; 昆明倾城国际青年旅社, Kūnmíng Qīngchéng Guójì Qīngnián Lǚshè; %871 6337 8910; 1330971349@qq.com; 92 Huashan Xilu, 华山西路92号; 8-/16-bed dm ¥55/45, s ¥178, d ¥228-258; iW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 昆明倾城国际青年旅社 ， Kūnmíng Qīngchéng Guójì Qīngnián Lǚshè; % 871 6337 8910;1330971349@qq.com; 华山西路华山西路 92 号 ;8 床/16 床 dm ¥55/45，s ¥178，d ¥228-258; i W ）

This large, friendly place aims to impress with its sharp red-and-black decor, welcoming kitchen and bar plus inside and outdoor communal areas with all the amenities backpackers are looking for. Dorms come with big lockers and power outlets. It has Englishspeaking staff and a handy location near Green Lake. Bikes can be rented for ¥30 a day.
这个宽敞而友好的地方旨在以其鲜明的红黑装饰、温馨的厨房和酒吧以及室内和室外公共区域以及背包客正在寻找的所有设施给人留下深刻印象。宿舍配有大储物柜和电源插座。它有会说英语的工作人员，位置便利，靠近绿湖。自行车可以租用，每天 30 日元。

It’s just off Huashan Xilu, near the back entrance of the landmark Green Lake Hotel.
它就在华山西路附近，靠近地标性建筑绿湖酒店的后门。

Yúndà BīnguǎnHOTEL¥¥
Yúndà BīnguǎnHOTEL¥¥

(map Google map; 云大宾馆, Yunnan University Hotel; %871 6503 4179; www.ynuhotel.com; Yieryi Dajie, 一二一大街; r ¥280-300; aW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 云大宾馆 ，云南大学宾馆; % 871 6503 4179;www.ynuhotel.com;Yieryi Dajie， 一二一大街 ;r ¥280-300; a W ）

Conveniently close to the restaurant and bar hub of Wenhua Xiang and Wenlin Jie, the Yúndà’s rooms are not exactly exciting but do the job. The hotel is divided into two, with the cheaper rooms with hard beds in the wing across the road from the main entrance. It’s popular and books up completely, so reserve in advance.
Yúndà 的客房交通便利，靠近 Wenhua Xiang 和 Wenlin Jie 的餐厅和酒吧中心，并不完全令人兴奋，但可以满足要求。酒店分为两部分，较便宜的房间在正门马路对面的侧翼设有硬床。它很受欢迎，预订已满，所以请提前预订。

Hump HostelHOSTEL¥¥
驼峰青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥¥¥

(map Google map; 驼峰客栈, Tuófēng Kèzhàn; %871 6464 7888; info@thehumphostel.com; Jinmabiji Guangchang, Jinbi Lu, 金碧路金马碧鸡广场; dm ¥68-88, d/tw ¥298/328; iW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 驼峰客栈 ，Tuófēng Kèzhàn; % 871 6464 7888;info@thehumphostel.com;金碧路金马碧鸡广场 ;DM ¥68-88， d/TW ¥298/328; i W ）

Kunming’s liveliest hostel, in part because of its rooftop bar and close proximity to many drinking spots and restaurants, this one’s mostly for the party crowd. The hostel itself has clean and big dorms (six to twelve beds); the private rooms are large, too, although the beds can be a bit hard.
昆明最热闹的旅馆，部分原因是它的屋顶酒吧，靠近许多饮酒场所和餐馆，这家旅馆主要适合派对人群。旅馆本身有干净而大的宿舍（六到十二张床）;包间也很大，虽然床可能有点硬。

oHotel ArtsBOUTIQUE HOTEL¥¥¥
o 艺术酒店精品酒店 ¥¥¥

(map Google map; 海院艺术酒店; %871 6311 1558; 173 Baoshan Jie, 宝善街173号; tw/d ¥558/668; aW)

Built around a tranquil garden space, large rooms here offer sitting areas overlooking the street below. It’s one of the most pleasant options in the city, and the neighbourhood is flush with bars and restaurants.
这里的大房间围绕着宁静的花园空间而建，提供俯瞰下面街道的休息区。这是这座城市最宜人的选择之一，附近遍布酒吧和餐馆。

Green Lake HotelHOTEL¥¥¥
绿湖酒店酒店¥¥¥

(map Google map; 翠湖宾馆, Cuìhú Bīnguǎn; %871 6515 8888; www.greenlakehotelkunming.cn; 6 Cuihu Nanlu, 翠湖南路6号; r incl breakfast from ¥998; naiWs)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 翠湖宾馆 ，Cuìhú Bīnguǎn; % 871 6515 8888;www.greenlakehotelkunming.cn;6 翠湖南路， 翠湖南路 6 号 ;含早餐¥998 起; n a i W s ）

Proud but subdued, this icon of Kunming hôtellerie history has a fabulous location opposite Green Park, and has kept up with modernity with a tasteful 2015 renovation and top-notch service. The panorama from the top floors is worth the price alone. Discounts are often available on their website, and there are Chinese, Japanese and western restaurants on-site.
这家昆明酒店历史的标志性建筑自豪而低调，地理位置优越，位于绿色公园对面，并通过 2015 年雅致的装修和一流的服务与现代潮流保持同步。从顶层的全景来看，光是这个价钱就值回来了。他们的网站上经常有折扣，酒店内有中式、日式和西式餐厅。

5Eating
5 吃

Kunming is a fine place to sample Yunnan’s most famous dish: ‘across-the-bridge noodles’ (过桥米线, guòqiáo mǐxiàn), but you’ll find restaurants serving food from every corner of the province. For all manner of foreign restaurants head to Wenhua Xiang and the streets surrounding nearby Yunnan University.
昆明是品尝云南最著名的菜肴的好地方：“ 过桥米线 ，guòqiáo mǐxiàn），但您会发现供应来自全省各个角落的美食的餐厅。对于各种外国餐厅，请前往文华乡和附近云南大学周围的街道。

Jiàn Xīn YuánYUNNAN¥
Jiàn Xīn Yuán 云南 ¥

(map Google map; 建新园; 195 Baoshan Jie, 宝善街195号; mains ¥7-40; h24hr; W)

Authentic Yunnan cuisine, including well-regarded ‘across-the-bridge noodles’, that won’t break the bank and is available around the clock. There’s a lot to like about this simple local chain. Look for another city-centre branch about 100m north of the Kunming Hotel map Google map (昆明饭店, Kūnmíng Fàndiàn; %871 6316 2063; kmhotel@public.km.yn.cn; 52 Dongfeng Donglu, 东风东路52号; tw/d ¥680/780; naiW).
正宗的云南美食，包括备受推崇的“过桥面条”，不会让您倾家荡产，而且全天候供应。这家简单的本地连锁店有很多值得喜欢的地方。在昆明饭店以北约 100 米处寻找另一家市中心分店 地图 谷歌地图 （ 昆明饭店 ， Kūnmíng Fàndiàn; % 871 6316 2063;kmhotel@public.km.yn.cn;东风东路 52 号东风东路 52 号 ;新台币/日¥680/780; n a i W ）。

Yíng Jiāng Dǎi Wèi YuánYUNNAN¥
Yíng Jiāng Dǎi Wèi Yuán 云南 ¥

(map Google map; 盈江傣味园; %871 6533 7889; 66 Cuihu Beilu, 翠湖北路66号; dishes from ¥20; h11.30am-2pm & 5.30-9pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 盈江傣味园 % 871 6533 7889; 翠湖北路翠湖北路 66 号翠湖北路 66 号 ; h 上午 11：30 至下午 2 点和晚上 5：30 至晚上 9 点）

Popular with the locals, this bustling restaurant offers an authentic taste of the delicious, sour and spicy cuisine of the Dai minority from Xishuangbanna in the deep south of Yunnan, including such delicacies as bamboo worms (they taste better than they sound). Hefty portions and a pleasant location by Green Lake, too. No English, but there’s a picture menu.
这家熙熙攘攘的餐厅深受当地人的欢迎，提供来自云南深处西双版纳的傣族美味、酸辣的正宗美食，包括竹虫等美食（味道比听起来好）。份量很大，绿湖边也是一个宜人的位置。没有英语，但有一个图片菜单。

As You LikeVEGETARIAN¥
随心所欲素食¥

(map Google map; 有佳面包店, Yǒujiā Miànbāo Diàn; %871 6541 1715; 5 Tianjundian Xiang, off Wenlin Jie, 文林街红豆园,天君殿巷5号; mains ¥18-60; h11am-10.30pm Tue-Sun; Wv)

This all-vegetarian cubbyhole cafe/restaurant is pleasant, though upstairs seating gets absolutely sweltering in the summer. Staff make excellent pizza, salads and sandwiches, all from local organic produce, as well as fine smoothies, and there’s a good range of Chinese teas.
这家全素食小房间咖啡馆/餐厅令人愉快，尽管楼上的座位在夏天会变得非常闷热。工作人员制作美味的比萨饼、沙拉和三明治，全部采用当地有机农产品，还有精美的冰沙，还有种类繁多的中国茶。

要找到它，沿着文林街（从文华乡来）向东走，然后从学校前的狭窄小巷左转，沿着它绕一圈。

Hóng Dòu YuánYUNNAN¥
Hóng Dòu Yuán 云南 ¥

(map Google map; 红豆圆; %871 6539 2020; 142 Wenlin Jie, 文林街142号; dishes from ¥15; h11.30am-9pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 红豆圆 % 871 6539 2020; 142 文林街， 文林街 142 号 ; 菜品¥15 起; h 上午 11：30 至晚上 9 点）

This old-school Chinese eatery, with a duck-your-head stairway, is a real locals hang-out on cosmopolitan Wenlin Jie. The food is excellent and will draw you back, despite the long dinnertime lines. Try regional specialities such as the táozá rǔbǐng (fried goat’s cheese and Yunnan ham) and liáng bái ròu (peppery, tangy beef). There’s a picture menu.
这家老式中餐馆设有鸭头楼梯，是国际化文林街真正的当地人聚会场所。食物很棒，尽管晚餐时间排了很长的队，但还是会吸引你回来。尝试当地特色菜，如 táozá rǔbǐng（炸山羊奶酪和云南火腿）和 liáng bái ròu（胡椒浓郁的牛肉）。有一个图片菜单。

oTǔ Shēngshí GuǎnYUNNAN¥¥
o Tǔ Shēngshí Guǎn 云南¥¥

(土生食馆; %871 6542 0010; District B, Jinding 1919, 15 Jindingshan Beilu, 金鼎山北路15号金鼎1919B区; mains ¥26-60; h9am-9.30pm; W)
（ 土生食馆 % 871 6542 0010;金鼎 1919 年金鼎山北路 15 号金鼎 1919B 区金鼎 1919B 区金鼎 1919B 区 ;主菜¥26-60; h 上午 9 点至晚上 9 点 30 分; W ）

On the ground floor of a converted warehouse a couple of kilometres northwest of the city centre, this family-run place strictly uses locally sourced organic ingredients for its selection of flavourful Yunnan dishes and Chinese favourites. The veggies and homemade tofu are outstanding and the atmosphere relaxed; there’s a small outside area. No English spoken, but there’s an English menu.
这家家庭经营的餐厅位于市中心西北几公里处一座由仓库改建而成的底层，严格使用当地采购的有机食材，精选美味的云南菜肴和中国美食。蔬菜和自制豆腐非常出色，气氛轻松;有一个小的外部区域。不会说英语，但有英文菜单。

Prague CafeCAFE¥¥
布拉格咖啡厅 CAFE¥¥

(map Google map; 布拉格咖啡馆, Bùlāgékāfēi Guǎn; %871 6533 2764; 40 Wenlin Jie #5, 文林街40号附5; mains from ¥40; h9am-9pm; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 布拉格咖啡馆 ，Bùlāgékāfēi Guǎn; % 871 6533 2764; 文林街 #5 40 号， 文林街 40 号附 5; 主菜¥40 起; h 上午 9 点至晚上 9 点; W ）

Breakfast, sandwiches, salads and more are available at this long-standing favourite for coffee lovers.
早餐、三明治、沙拉等在这家长期深受咖啡爱好者喜爱的地方提供。

CantinaITALIAN¥¥
Cantina ITALIAN¥¥

(map Google map; 意老夫子意大利餐厅, Yìlǎofūzi Yìdàlì Cāntīng; %180 8827 1192; 9 Hongshan Donglu, Backstreet Block, Bldg 11-1, 虹山东路9号版筑翠园商铺11幢一层1号（麦当劳隔壁）; mains from ¥42; h10.30am-11pm Tue-Sun; W)

This large, light-filled Italian-run venue is set around an attractive central bar. There’s a wide selection of pizza, pasta and panini (from ¥28), steaks and more. Good wine list, aperitifs, and cocktails, plus there are daily lunch specials (from ¥49).
这个大型、光线充足的意大利餐厅围绕着一个迷人的中央酒吧。这里有各种各样的比萨饼、意大利面和帕尼尼（28 日元起）、牛排等。美味的酒单、开胃酒和鸡尾酒，还有每日特色午餐（49 日元起）。

It’s inside the Banzhucuiyuan complex northwest of the centre. To find it, walk a little east of the McDonald’s.
它位于市中心西北部的板竹翠园建筑群内。要找到它，请从麦当劳向东走一点。

HumdingerGASTROPUB¥¥
Humdinger 美食酒吧 ¥¥

(map Google map; 玩啤, Wánpí; %871 6360 1611; www.humdingerpub.com; 111 Zhengyi Lu, 正义路111号; mains ¥22-98; h5.30pm-2.30am; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 玩啤 ，万皮; % 871 6360 1611;www.humdingerpub.com;111 正义路， 正义路 111 号 ;主菜¥22-98; h 下午 5：30 至凌晨 2：30; W ）

Despite the giant vats on show, this place is much more of a restaurant than a bar. Expect a mixed menu of western and Chinese food – burgers and brats alongside spicy beef noodles and BBQ chicken feet – to complement a range of beers brewed in-house. Locals love it, packing it out every evening.
尽管展示了巨大的大桶，但这个地方更像是一家餐厅而不是酒吧。期待西餐和中餐的混合菜单——汉堡和小子，以及辣牛肉面和烧烤鸡爪——与一系列内部酿造的啤酒相得益彰。当地人喜欢它，每天晚上都会把它打包出来。

Brooklyn PizzeriaPIZZA¥¥
布鲁克林比萨店披萨 ¥¥

(map Google map; 布鲁克林批萨店, Bùlǔkèlín Pīsǎdiàn; %871 6539 1208; www.kunmingpizza.com; 6-8, Bldg 12 Banzhucuiyuan, 4 Hongshan Donglu, 虹山东路4号版筑翠园12栋6-8商铺; mains ¥45-73, pizzas from ¥65; h11am-10pm; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 布鲁克林批萨店 ， Bùlǔkèlín Pīsǎdiàn; % 871 6539 1208;www.kunmingpizza.com;虹山东路红山东路 4 号板竹翠园 12 号楼 6-8 号， 版筑翠园 12 栋 6-8 商铺 ;主菜¥45-73，披萨¥65 起; h 上午 11 点至晚上 10 点; W ）

Pizza, pasta, salads, sandwiches: the list continues. If you’re looking for western comfort food, this is the place. It’s unsurprisingly popular with the expat crowd. Find it northwest of the centre of town, in a busy pocket of restaurants and bars.
比萨饼、意大利面、沙拉、三明治：名单还在继续。如果您正在寻找西式舒适食品，这里就是您的最佳选择。毫不奇怪，它受到外籍人群的欢迎。它位于市中心的西北部，在繁忙的餐馆和酒吧区。

Salvador’sINTERNATIONAL¥¥
萨尔瓦多国际赛 ¥¥

(map Google map; 萨尔瓦多咖啡馆, Sà’ěrwǎduō kāfēiguǎn; %871 6531 5811; www.salvadors.cn; 76 Wenhua Xiang, 文化巷76号; mains from ¥30; h9am-11.30pm; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 萨尔瓦多咖啡馆 ，Sà'ěrwǎduō kāfēiguǎn; % 871 6531 5811;www.salvadors.cn;76 文华巷， 文化巷 76 号 ;主菜¥30 起; h 上午 9 点至晚上 11 点 30 分; W ）

Always busy with travellers and students, Salvador’s is now a Kunming staple. With a Mexican/Mediterranean food theme, as well as solid breakfasts, good coffee and a decent range of teas, it caters for all hours of the day. In the evening, you can hang around the bar and watch as Kunming’s hipsters and youth parade along Wenhua Xiang.
Salvador's 总是忙于旅行者和学生，现在是昆明的主食。它以墨西哥/地中海美食为主题，提供丰盛的早餐、优质咖啡和种类繁多的茶，可满足一天中所有时间的需求。晚上，您可以在酒吧闲逛，观看昆明的潮人和青年沿着文华乡游行。

oShípíng HuìguǎnYUNNAN¥¥¥
o Shípíng Huìguǎn 云南¥¥¥

(map Google map; 石屏会馆; %871 6362 7222; 24 Zhonghe Xiang, 中和巷24号; mains ¥28-138; h10am-noon & 1.30-8.30pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 石屏会馆 % 871 6362 7222; 24 Zhonghe Xiang， 中和巷 24 号 ; mains ¥28-138; h 上午 10 点至中午 1.30 和晚上 1.30-8.30）

Try authentic Yunnan cuisine in a beautifully restored heritage courtyard building with outdoor seating – this is one of our favourite restaurants in the city. No English menus (or spoken), but digital tablet menus do have photos. There are a handful of inexpensive dishes, including well-executed stinky tofu, but overall expect this to be a splurge.
在经过精心修复的带户外座位的传统庭院建筑中品尝正宗的云南美食——这是我们在这座城市最喜欢的餐厅之一。没有英文菜单（或口语），但数字平板电脑菜单有照片。有一些便宜的菜肴，包括制作精良的臭豆腐，但总的来说，这会是一次挥霍。

6Drinking & Nightlife
6 饮酒与夜生活

Foreigners congregate in the bars on and around Wenhua Xiang and Banzhucuiyuan. Head to the Kūndū Night Market area and Jinmabiji Sq for Chinese-style clubs and bars.
外国人聚集在文华巷和板竹翠园及其周边的酒吧里。前往 Kūndū 夜市区和 Jinmabiji 广场，那里有中式俱乐部和酒吧。

oUncle John’s Craft BeerCRAFT BEER
o 约翰叔叔的精酿啤酒 CRAFT BEER

(map Google map; 约翰叔叔的啤酒墙, Yuēhàn Shūshu de Píjiǔ Qiáng; %138 8850 0050; 2nd fl, Bldg 12 Banzhucuiyuan, 11 Hongshan Donglu, 虹山东路11号版筑翠园电影院2楼; h5.30pm-2am; W)

The new second branch of a long-standing Kunming favourite is far more accessible, and the long wooden bar is fairly inviting as well. You’d have to try quite hard to sample the whole range of Uncle John’s brews (some of which are made on-site), but luckily there’s a sampler paddle to help things along.
昆明长期以来最受欢迎的新第二家分店更容易到达，长长的木制酒吧也相当诱人。您必须非常努力地品尝约翰叔叔的整个系列啤酒（其中一些是现场制作的），但幸运的是，有一个采样桨可以帮助事情进行。

oM For MakerCOFFEE

(map Google map; 梵米客, Fàn Mǐkè; %138 8882 3050; #6, Bldg 14 Banzhucuiyuan, 9 Hongshan Donglu, 虹山东路9号版筑翠园14栋一层6号; h10.30am-9pm; W)

Yunnanese and Ethiopian beans are roasted on-site and served as delightfully balanced brews at this tiny, unprepossessing coffee shop beyond Brooklyn Pizzeria.
云南和埃塞俄比亚的咖啡豆在现场烘焙，并在布鲁克林比萨店外的这家不起眼的小咖啡店中作为令人愉悦的平衡冲泡。

O’Reilly’s Beer GardenBEER GARDEN
奥莱利啤酒花园啤酒花园

(map Google map; 爱尔兰酒吧啤酒花园, Ài’ěrlán Jiǔbā Píjiǔ Huāyuán; %136 6875 7476; 52 Dongfeng Donglu, 东风东路52号; h10am-2am; W)

This Yunnan-based chain of Irish pubs actually hits pretty close to the mark with a massive beer list (though disappointingly no Chinese options) and spirits and cocktails, as well as a short but appetising selection of western and Chinese dishes. On breezy Kunming nights, the patio area is a delight, particularly if you make it over during happy hour.
这家总部位于云南的爱尔兰连锁酒吧实际上非常接近目标，提供大量的啤酒单（尽管令人失望的是没有中国选择）和烈酒和鸡尾酒，以及简短但开胃的西式和中式菜肴。在微风习习的昆明夜晚，露台区令人愉悦，尤其是在欢乐时光期间。

It’s inside the commercial annexe of the Kunming Hotel, accessible directly from Dongfeng Donglu.
它位于昆明饭店的商业附楼内，可从东风东路直接进入。

Yun BrewingCRAFT BEER
云酿精酿啤酒

(云酿, Yún Niàng; %871 6531 1927; 5 Kunjian Lu, 昆建路5; h11am-2am; W)
（ 云酿 ，Yún Niàng; % 871 6531 1927; 5 昆建路 5; h 上午 11 点至凌晨 2 点; W ）

Sixteen homebrews, a fridge full of imports and a fun-loving vibe all recommend this as one of the better craft-beer places in Kunming.
16 种自制啤酒、一个装满进口啤酒的冰箱和有趣的氛围都推荐这里是昆明最好的精酿啤酒场所之一。

The brewpub sits just behind the 108 Loft Complex (108智库空间, 108 Zhìkù Kōngjiān), a creative space with sometimes-open art galleries and a handful of other bars and restaurants.
啤酒吧位于 108 Loft Complex（108 智库空间 ，108 Zhìkù Kōngjiān）后面，这是一个创意空间，有时有开放的艺术画廊和一些其他酒吧和餐馆。

EGOCRAFT BEER
EGO 精酿啤酒

(map Google map; %181 0105 4707; #3, Bldg 11, Qicai Junyuan, Baita Lu, 白塔路七彩俊园11栋3号商铺; h9.30am-2am)

Along with a handful of their own drinkable home brews here, there’s a long list (and cooler full) of domestic and import craft offerings to complement a menu of pub grub.
除了一些他们自己的可饮用的自制啤酒外，这里还有一长串（而且更酷）的国内和进口工艺产品，以补充酒吧美食菜单。

7Shopping
7 购物

Yunnan specialities are marbled batik from Dali, jade from Ruili, minority peoples embroidery, musical instruments and spotted-brass utensils.
云南特产有大理石蜡染、瑞丽玉石、少数民族刺绣、乐器和斑铜器皿。

Yunnanese tea is an excellent buy and comes in several varieties, from bowl-shaped bricks of smoked green tea called tuóchá, which have been around since at least Marco Polo’s time, to leafy black tea that rivals some of India’s best.
云南茶是极好的选择，有多种品种，从碗形的烟熏绿茶砖（ 至少从马可波罗时代就已经存在）到可与印度一些最好的红茶相媲美的绿叶红茶。

Tianfu Famous TeasTEA
天府名茶茶

(map Google map; 天福茗茶, Tiānfú Míngchá; %871 6718 0701; 41 Shangyi Jie (cnr Beijing Lu), 尚义街41号; h9am-10pm; mDongfeng Square)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 天福茗茶 ，Tiānfú Míngchá; % 871 6718 0701; 尚义街 41 h 号 9am-10pm; m 东风广场）

This place offers most types of teas grown in Yunnan, including the famed pǔ’ěr tea, and there are sometimes English-speaking staff available to help foreign shoppers make a selection.
这个地方提供云南种植的大多数茶叶，包括著名的 pǔ'ěr 茶，有时还会有会说英语的工作人员帮助外国购物者进行选择。

Mandarin BooksBOOKS
普通话图书 BOOKS

(map Google map; 漫林书苑, Mànlín Shūyuàn; %871 6551 6579; www.mandarinbooks.cn; 52 Wenhua Xiang, 文化巷52号; h9am-10pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 漫林书苑 ，Mànlín Shūyuàn; % 871 6551 6579;www.mandarinbooks.cn; 文化巷 52 号 h 9am-10pm）

Good spot for novels and a selection of travel writing in English and other languages, as well as books on Yunnan itself and a small selection of maps of the province.
这里是阅读小说和精选的英语和其他语言的旅行作品的好地方，以及有关云南本身的书籍和少量该省地图。

8Information
8 信息

MEDICAL SERVICES
医疗服务

Richland International Hospital (瑞奇德国际医院, Ruìqídé Guójì Yīyuàn; %871 6574 1988; 1st fl, Shangdu International Tower, 1208 Beijing Lu, 北京路1208号尚都国际大厦一楼; h8.30am-5pm; mBeichen) Most of the doctors are Chinese, but English is spoken here. Standards are generally good and prices are reasonable. It’s on the bottom three floors of the Shangdu International Tower. A taxi ride from the city centre costs around ¥30 or it’s a short walk north of the Beichen station on the Metro Line 2.
瑞奇德国际医院（Richland International Hospital， Ruìqídé Guójì Yīyuàn; % 871 6574 1988;北京路北京路 1208 号尚都国际大厦一楼 1208 号尚都国际大厦一楼 h 8.30am-5pm; m 北辰） 医生大多是中国人，但这里说英语。标准总体良好，价格合理。它位于上都国际大厦的底层三层。从市中心乘坐出租车大约需要 30 日元，或者乘坐地铁 2 号线从北辰站以北步行不远即可到达。

Watsons (屈臣氏, Qūchénshì; %871 6836 9201; 68 Zhengyi Jie, 正义路68号; h10am-10.30pm) Western cosmetics and basic medicines. Other branches around town.
屈臣氏 （ 屈臣氏 ，Qūchénshì; % 871 6836 9201; 68 正义路 68 号 h 10am-10.30pm） 西药及基础药。镇上的其他分支机构。

Yan’an Hospital (延安医院, Yán’ān Yīyuàn; %871 6321 1073; 245 Renmin Donglu, 人民东路245号) Has a foreigners’ clinic, but not a lot of English is spoken.
延安医院 （ 延安医院 ，Yán'ān Yīyuàn; % 871 6321 1073;人民东路 245 号人民东路 245 号 ） 有外国人诊所，但不会说英语。

MONEY
钱

Many ATMs around town accept international cards.
镇上的许多自动取款机都接受国际卡。

Bank of China (中国银行, Zhōngguó Yínháng; %871 6319 2915; 515 Beijing Lu, 北京路515号; h9am-5.30pm; mJiaosanqiao) All necessary services and has an ATM.
中国银行 （ 中国银行 ，Zhōngguó Yínháng; % 871 6319 2915;北京路 h 515 号 9am-5.30pm; m 焦三桥） 所有必要的服务并有自动取款机。

Bank of China (中国银行, Zhōngguó Yínháng; %871 6361 2090; 16 Dongfeng Xilu, 东风西路16号; h9am-5.30pm Mon-Fri; mWuyi Road) Will change foreign currency and travellers cheques.
中国银行 （ 中国银行 ，Zhōngguó Yínháng; % 871 6361 2090; 东风西路 16 号 h 周一至周五上午 9 时至下午 5 时 30 分; m 五一路）将兑换外币和旅行支票。

PUBLIC SECURITY BUREAU
公安局

Public Security Bureau (PSB, 公安局, Gōng’ānjú; %871 6335 7157; 118 Tuodong Lu, 拓东路118号; h9-11.30am & 1-5pm Mon-Fri) Stop by for information on visa extensions.
公安局 （PSB， 公安局 ，Gōng'ānjú; % 871 6335 7157; 拓东路拓东路 118 号 h 周一至周五上午 9-11.30 & 下午 1-5 点） 请前往了解签证延期信息。

SAFE TRAVEL
安全旅行

As always, take special precautions against pickpockets at and around the train and longdistance bus stations. There have been a number of travellers who’ve reportedly been drugged and robbed on overnight sleeper buses.
与往常一样，在火车站和长途汽车站及其周围采取特殊预防措施，防止扒手。据报道，有许多旅客在夜间卧铺巴士上被下药和抢劫。

TOURIST INFORMATION
旅游信息

Most of the backpacker hotels and some of the cafes can assist with travel queries and they are usually the best places to get travel advice.
大多数背包客酒店和一些咖啡馆都可以协助解决旅行问题，它们通常是获得旅行建议的最佳场所。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

AIR
空气

Kunming’s airport is located 25km northeast of the city.
昆明机场位于城市东北25公里处。

It has direct services to/from North America, Europe and Australia. International flights to Asian cities include Bangkok (from ¥433), Hong Kong (from ¥804), Vientiane (from ¥704), Yangon (from ¥975) and Kuala Lumpur (from ¥606).
它有往返北美、欧洲和澳大利亚的直达服务。飞往亚洲城市的国际航班包括曼谷（433 日元起）、香港（804 日元起）、万象（704 日元起）、仰光（975 日元起）和吉隆坡（606 日元起）。

China Eastern Airlines (东方航空售票中心, Dōngfāng Hángkōng Shòupiào Zhōngxīn; %871 6515 4119, 95530; 21st fl, China Merchant’s Bank Tower, Huguo Jie, 护国街道招银大厦21楼; h8.30am-5pm) issues tickets for any Chinese airline but the office only offers discounts on certain flights.
中国东方航空 （East Eastern Airlines（东方航空售票中心 ， Dōngfāng Hángkōng Shòupiào Zhōngxīn; % 871 6515 4119， 95530; 护国街道招银大厦 21 楼，护国街道招银大厦 21 楼 h ，8.30am-5pm） 为任何中国航空公司出票，但该办公室仅提供某些航班的折扣。

Daily flights from Kunming go to most major cities across China, including Beijing (from ¥782), Guangzhou (from ¥450) and Shanghai (from ¥800). There are regional services to Lhasa in Tibet (¥1960) and within Yunnan, including Baoshan (from ¥395), Lijiang (from ¥320), Tengchong (from ¥490) and Xiaguan/Dali (from ¥320).
从昆明出发的每日航班飞往中国大多数主要城市，包括北京（782 日元起）、广州（450 日元起）和上海（800 日元起）。有前往西藏拉萨（1960 日元）和云南境内的区域服务，包括宝山（395 日元起）、丽江（320 日元起）、腾冲（490 日元起）和下关/大理（320 日元起）。

BORDER CROSSINGS: LAOS & VIETNAM
过境点：老挝和越南

Getting to Laos
前往老挝

A daily bus from Kunming to Vientiane (¥587, 25 hours) leaves from the south bus station at 6pm. Alternatively, take a bus to Mohan (¥260 to ¥301, 10 hours), on the border with Laos; these depart at 12.20pm and 8pm. While the Lao Consulate in Kunming does issue visas, for most nationalities it will be more convenient to get a visa on arrival at the border.
从昆明到万象的巴士（587日元，25小时）每天下午6点从南车站出发。或者，乘坐巴士前往与老挝接壤的莫汉（260 至 301 日元，10 小时）;这些航班于中午 12 点 20 分和晚上 8 点出发。虽然老挝驻昆明领事馆确实签发签证，但对于大多数国籍来说，在边境落地办理签证会更方便。

Getting to Vietnam
前往越南

The only way to get overland to Vietnam from Kunming for now is by bus or train to the border town of Hekou, and then a local bus to the Lao Cai border checkpoint.
目前从昆明陆路前往越南的唯一方法是乘坐公共汽车或火车到边境小镇河口，然后乘坐当地巴士到老街边境检查站。

Official proceedings at this border crossing can be frustrating – Chinese officials have been known to confiscate Lonely Planet guides because they show Taiwan as a different country to China, while Vietnamese customs officers have been known to ask for bribes. Just keep your cool.
这个过境点的官方程序可能会令人沮丧——众所周知，中国官员会没收《孤独星球》导游，因为它们表明台湾与中国不同，而越南海关官员则以索贿而闻名。只要保持冷静。

From the Vietnamese side of the border, it’s a 15-minute walk to the Lao Cai train station and onward connections into Vietnam.
从边境的越南一侧步行 15 分钟即可到达老街火车站，并继续转机前往越南。

On the Chinese side, the border checkpoint is technically open from 8am to 11pm but don’t bank on anything after 6pm. Set your watch when you cross the border – the time in China is one hour later than in Vietnam. Visas are unobtainable at the border crossing.
在中国方面， 边境检查站从早上 8 点到晚上 11 点严格开放，但晚上 6 点之后不要指望任何东西。过境时请设置手表——中国的时间比越南晚一小时。在过境点无法获得签证。

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

TO/FROM THE AIRPORT
往返机场

Ignore the many unofficial taxi touts who will approach you after you exit customs. Always take an official cab. Metered taxis charge ¥80 to ¥90 into town, depending on traffic and where you are going, including a ¥10 toll en route.
忽略许多非官方的出租车兜售者，他们会在您出海关后接近您。始终乘坐官方出租车。计程出租车进城收费 80 至 90 日元，具体取决于交通情况和您要去的地方，包括 10 日元的中途通行费。

Line 6 of the Kunming Metro connects the airport to the east bus station (¥3, 15 minutes), where it’s possible to change to Line 3 and continue on to Dongfeng Square (¥5) in about one hour, including transfer time.
昆明地铁6号线连接机场和东公交站（3日元，15分钟），可以换乘3号线，继续前往东风广场（5日元），大约需要1小时，包括换乘时间。

Airport buses (24 hours, regular/express ¥13/25) run to/from the airport every 30 minutes on three different routes, the most convenient being the one that runs to the main train station, the north train station and western bus station.
机场巴士（24小时，普通/特快13/25日元）每30分钟一班，有3条不同的路线往返机场，最方便的是前往火车总站、北站和西站的巴士。

From the airport’s long-distance bus station, regular departures leave for the following destinations:
从机场的长途巴士站出发，定期发车前往以下目的地：

Baoshan ¥219, nine hours, four daily, 11am to 5.30pm
宝山 219 日元，9 小时，每天 4 小时，上午 11 点至下午 5：30

Dali ¥220, five hours, three daily, 12pm to 4.30pm
大理 220 日元，五小时，每天三次，中午 12 点至下午 4：30

Jinghong ¥288, eight hours, 9am & 2.30pm
景红 288 日元，8 小时，上午 9 点和下午 2：30

Shilin ¥45, two hours, 10 daily, 9.20am to 7pm
士林 45 日元，两小时，每天 10 点，上午 9：20 至晚上 7 点

BUS
总线

Bus fares within the city are ¥1, though trips to outlying suburbs may run as high as ¥4; most require exact change. City buses all run from 6.30am to 8pm, many with slightly longer hours.
市内巴士票价为 1 日元，但前往郊区的巴士票价可能高达 4 日元;大多数需要精确的更改。城市公交车的运行时间均为早上 6.30 至晚上 8 点，许多公交车的运行时间稍长。

Bus 2 runs from the train station to Government Sq (Dongfeng Guangchang) and then near Green Lake past the Confucian Temple to Huangtupu (where you can transfer for a minibus to the Bamboo Temple).
2 路公交车从火车站开往政府广场（东风广昌），然后在绿湖附近经过文庙到达黄土埔（在那里您可以转乘小巴前往竹庙）。

TRAIN
火车

Three metro lines are now operational in Kunming, though they’re marked as four (Line 1 turns into Line 2 without passengers needing to switch trains), and two more lines are in the works.
昆明目前有三条地铁线路运营，但它们被标记为四条（1 号线变成 2 号线，乘客无需换乘火车），另外两条线路正在建设中。

Fares range from ¥2 to ¥7 based on travel distance, and all trains run at least from 6.40am to 10.20pm. For now, the most useful stops include the train and bus stations, as well as Government Sq (Dongfeng Guangchang) in the centre of town.
票价从 2 日元到 7 日元不等，根据旅行距离，所有列车至少在早上 6：40 至晚上 10：20 运行。目前，最有用的站点包括火车站和汽车站，以及市中心的政府广场（东风广昌）。

Around Kunming
昆明周边

There are some grand sights within a 15km radius of Kunming, but getting to most of them is time-consuming and you’ll find the majority of them extremely crowded (weekdays are best to avoid the crowds).
昆明半径 15 公里范围内有一些宏伟的景点，但前往其中大部分景点都很耗时，而且您会发现其中大多数都非常拥挤（工作日最好避开人群）。

If you don’t have much time, the Bamboo Temple and Xi Shan are the most interesting. Both have decent transport connections. Dian Lake has terrific circular-tour possibilities of its own, particularly for ardent cyclists.
如果时间不多，竹庙和习山是最有意思的。两者都有良好的交通连接。滇湖本身就有绝佳的环游可能性，特别是对于狂热的自行车手来说。

Bamboo TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
竹寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map; 筇竹寺, Qióngzhú Sì; %871 6818 1881; Heiqiong Lu, 黑筇路; h8am-5pm) F
（ 地图 ; 筇竹寺 ， Qióngzhú Sì; % 871 6818 1881; 黑筇路 h 8am-5pm） F

Tucked away atop a winding mountain road up the forested hills northwest of the city centre, this serene temple is definitely one to be visited by sculptors as much as by those interested in temple collecting. Raised during the Tang dynasty in 639 AD, it was refitted in the Qing Dynasty by master Sichuan sculptor Li Guangxiu and his apprentices, featuring 500 luóhàn (罗汉, arhats or noble ones) in a fascinating mishmash of superb realism and head-scratching exaggerated surrealism.
这座宁静的寺庙隐藏在市中心西北部森林覆盖的山丘上蜿蜒的山路上，绝对是雕塑家和对寺庙收藏感兴趣的人都会参观的地方。它于公元 639 年在唐代兴起，在清代由四川雕塑大师李光秀和他的徒弟们进行了改造，以 500 个罗汉 （ 罗汉，罗汉或贵族）为特色，融合了精湛的现实主义和令人头疼的夸张超现实主义。

Li and his mates pretty much went gonzo in their excruciating, seven-year attempt to perfectly represent human existence in statuary. Check out the 70-odd surfing Buddhas, riding the waves on a variety of mounts – blue dogs, giant crabs, shrimp and turtles. So lifelike are the sculptures that they were considered in bad taste by Li Guangxiu’s contemporaries (some of whom no doubt appeared in caricature), and upon the project’s completion he disappeared into thin air.
李和他的伙伴们几乎是奇闻趣事，他们长达七年的痛苦尝试，试图在雕像中完美地表现人类的存在。看看 70 多尊冲浪佛，他们骑着各种坐骑乘风破浪——蓝狗、巨蟹、虾和海龟。这些雕塑栩栩如生，以至于李光秀的同时代人认为它们品味不佳（其中一些人无疑出现在漫画中），项目完成后，他就消失得无影无踪。

The temple is about 12km northwest of Kunming. Take a bus to Huangtupo (黄土坡, Huángtǔpō; Bus 2 runs here from the Confucian Temple bus stop), from where minibus C61 (¥8 per person) runs to the Bamboo Temple. If you visit around midday the temple kitchen prepares a simple vegetarian lunch for ¥10 per person, and the all-day teahouse on-site makes a pleasant stop as well.
该寺位于昆明西北约 12 公里处。乘坐巴士前往黄土坡（黄土坡 ，Huángtǔpō;从文庙巴士站乘坐 2 路公交车，从那里乘坐小巴 C61（每人 8 日元）前往竹庙。如果您在中午左右参观，寺庙厨房会准备简单的素食午餐，每人 10 日元，酒店内的全天茶馆也是一个愉快的停留场所。

Diān ChíLAKE
点志湖

(滇池, Dian Lake)
（ 滇池 ，滇湖）

The shoreline of Dian Chi, located to the south of Kunming, is dotted with settlements, farms and fishing enterprises, and tourist resorts. The lake is elongated – about 40km from north to south – and covers an area of 300 sq km. Plying the waters are fānchuán (pirate-sized junks with bamboo-battened canvas sails). The area around the lake is mainly for scenic touring and hiking, and there are some fabulous aerial views from the ridges at Dragon Gate in Xi Shan.
位于昆明以南的点池海岸线上，点缀着聚落、农场和渔业企业以及旅游度假区。该湖细长，南北长约 40 公里，面积 300 平方公里。在水域中穿梭的是 fānchuán（带有竹板帆帆的海盗大小的帆船）。湖周边地区主要用于风景优美的旅游和徒步旅行，从习山龙门的山脊上可以鸟瞰到一些美妙的景色。

Xi Shan 西山
Xi Shan 西山

The craggy forested range of Xi Shan (Xī Shān) on the western side of Dian Chi lake makes for a great day trip from Kunming. The area is full of walking trails (some have very steep sections), quiet temples, gates and lovely forests – including an area known as the ‘mini stone forest’ for its rocky outcrops. Try to avoid the weekends, when Kunmingers come here in droves.
习山 （Xī Shān） 位于滇池湖西侧，崎岖的森林山脉是从昆明出发的绝佳一日游。该地区到处都是步行道（有些路段非常陡峭）、安静的寺庙、大门和美丽的森林——包括一个因其岩石露头而被称为 “迷你石林 ”的地区。尽量避开周末，昆明格人成群结队地来到这里。

Around Kunming
昆明周边

1Top Sights
1 热门景点

1Golden TempleB1
1 金庙 B1

1Sights

6 云南省博物馆 B2

1Sights
1 景点

The temples and trails of the lower sections of Xi Shan are free to visit, while entrance to the large Dragon Gate area atop the mountain requires an entry ticket.
习山下游的寺庙和小径是免费参观的，而进入山顶的大型龙门区则需要门票。

Taihua TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
太华寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map; 太华寺, Tàihuá Sì; h8am-5pm) F
（ 地图 ; 太华寺 ，Tàihuá Sì; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点） F

The courtyard of the Ming dynasty Taihua Temple houses a fine collection of flowering trees, including magnolias and camellias, and is a popular to place to relax on the way up or down the mountain.
明代太华寺的庭院里种满了木兰花和山茶花等精美的花树，是上下山途中休闲的热门场所。

The road from Huating Temple winds 2km up to the turn-off for Taihua, but if you’re travelling on foot look for the pleasant Taihua Ancient Road (太华古道, Tàihuá Gǔdào) that climbs above the bus road, on a 1.3km track of stone staircases and pathways.
从华亭寺出发的道路蜿蜒 2 公里，到达太华岔路口，但如果您步行旅行，可以寻找宜人的太华古道（太华古道 ，太华古道），它爬上公交道上方，沿着 1.3 公里长的石阶和小径。

Huating TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
华亭寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map; 华亭寺, Huátíng Sì; h8am-5pm) F
（ 地图 ; 华亭寺 ，Huátíng Sì; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点） F

Towards the bottom of the mountain is Huating Temple, a country temple of the Nanzhao kingdom believed to have been constructed in the 11th century. It’s one of the largest in the province and its numerous halls are decorated with arhats.
山脚下是华亭寺，这是一座南诏国的乡村寺庙，据信建于 11 世纪。它是该省最大的大厅之一，其众多的大厅都装饰着罗汉。

From the metro station, walk about 3km up the main Xishan road (or catch the tourist bus, which picks up and drops off just outside the temple).
从地铁站出发，沿西山主干道步行约 3 公里（或乘坐旅游巴士，在寺庙外上下车）。

Dragon GateHISTORIC SITE
龙门历史遗迹

(龙门, Lóng Mén; %871 6842 6668; ¥30; h8.30am-5.30pm)
（ 龙门 ，Lóng Mén; % 871 6842 6668;30 日元; h 上午 8：30 至下午 5：30）

On the upper reaches of Xi Shan, the ‘Dragon Gate Scenic Area’ is a collection of pavilions, temples and grottoes scattered along the mountaintop. The highlight is the eponymous Longmen Grottoes, a series of passages carved deep into the cliffside between 1781 and 1835, punctuated with small shrines and incredible views across to Dian Chi lake.
在习山上游，“龙门景区”是散布在山顶的亭台楼阁、寺庙和石窟的集合体。亮点是同名的龙门石窟 ，这是 1781 年至 1835 年间在悬崖边深处雕刻的一系列通道，点缀着小神龛和点池湖的壮丽景色。

Lingxu PavilionVIEWPOINT
凌虚馆 VIEWPOINT

(凌虚阁, Língxū Gé)

One of the topmost publicly accessible points of Xi Shan, this large pavilion inside the Dragon Gate scenic area offers breathtaking views of Dian Chi lake as a reward for the equally breathtaking climb.
这座位于龙门景区内的大型凉亭是习山最顶级的公共景点之一，可欣赏到奠池的壮丽景色，作为同样令人叹为观止的攀登的奖励。

Sānqīng GéTAOIST TEMPLE
山庆格道教寺

(三清阁; h8.30am-5.30pm)

Towards the bottom of the Longmen area, this was a country villa of a Yuan dynasty prince that was later turned into a temple dedicated to the three main Taoist deities (sānqīng refers to the highest level of Taoist enlightenment). It now features a delightful series of panels depicting legends surrounding the Longmen Grottoes.
在龙门地区的底部，这是一座元朝王子的乡村别墅，后来被改造成一座供奉三大道教神灵的寺庙（ 三青是指道教启蒙的最高层次）。现在，它拥有一系列令人愉悦的面板，描绘了龙门石窟周围的传说。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Xishan Park is the western terminus of Metro Line 3. Just south of the metro station, tourist buses (¥12) shuttle visitors 6km up the mountain road to the Dragon Gate ticket office and chairlift (龙门索道, Lóngmén Suǒdào; one-way ¥25; h9am-5pm), passing by Huating and Taihua Temples en route.
西山公园是地铁 3 号线的西终点站。在地铁站以南，旅游巴士（12 日元）将游客接载到 6 公里的山路上龙门售票处和缆车 （ 龙门索道 ，Lóngmén Suǒdào;单程 25 日元; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）， 途中经过华亭寺和太华寺。

From the ticket office and chairlift, electric carts (¥10) cover the 1.5km section of road up to the bottom of the actual grottoes. It’s a pleasant, shaded walk, with no other traffic apart from the carts.
从售票处和缆车出发，电动推车（10日元）将覆盖1.5公里的路段，一直到真正的石窟底部。这是一条令人愉快的阴凉步行路，除了手推车之外没有其他交通。

From the top of the Dragon Gate grottoes section, it’s possible climb a little further to the chairlift and return to the base, or continue further upwards to the Lingxu Pavilion and incredible panoramic views of Kunming and Dian Chi, then descend on a short side trail to the Dragon Gate South Entrance (龙门景区南门, Lóngmén Jǐngqū Nánmén).
从龙门石窟部分的顶部，可以再爬一点到缆车并返回基地，或者继续向上爬到灵虚阁，欣赏昆明和典池的壮丽全景，然后沿着一条短小路下降到龙门南入口（ 龙门景区南门 ，Lóngmén Jǐngqū Nánmén）。

While no public transport serves the south entrance, private vans often wait to shuttle travellers between there and the metro for ¥40 per vehicle, making a one-way through-hike of the mountain utterly practical.
虽然南入口没有公共交通工具，但私人面包车经常等待接送旅客往返于那里和地铁之间，每辆车 40 日元，这使得单程徒步登山变得非常实用。

Heijing 黑井

%0878

Time-warped Heijing (Hēijǐng) has been known for salt production for centuries and is still an important producer of the ‘white gold’, as well as home to a sizeable Hui Muslim community. Heijing has retained much of its period architecture and is a great place to wander for a day or two, marvelling at the old gates, temples and shady narrow alleys. The village makes a fine stopping-off point if you want to take the route less travelled between Dali and Kunming.
几个世纪以来，时间扭曲的黑井 （Hēijǐng） 一直以盐生产而闻名，至今仍是“白金”的重要生产地，也是相当大的回族穆斯林社区的所在地。黑景保留了大部分时期建筑，是漫步一两天的好地方，惊叹于古老的城门、寺庙和阴凉的狭窄小巷。如果您想走大理和昆明之间人迹罕至的路线，这个村庄是一个很好的中转站。

The ¥30 entry fee at the main gate (a couple of kilometres before the village) includes admission to Dalong Ci (大龙祠, Dàlóng Cí), the clan meeting hall, and Guyan Fang (古盐坊, Gǔyán Fáng), an old salt production facility. The latter offers brief descriptions of the history of salt production, although none in English. You can find it by walking east from the village for about 15 minutes. A few old salt wells around the village can also be inspected: look out for the Black Cow Well (黑牛井, Hēiniú Jǐng), just south of Dalong Ci.
在正门（村前几公里处）的 30 日元入场费包括宗族会议厅大龙祠 （ 大龙祠 ，Dàlóng Cí）和古盐坊（古盐坊 ，Gǔyán Fáng）， 一个古老的盐生产设施。后者简要描述了盐生产的历史，尽管没有英文。从村子往东走约 15 分钟即可找到。还可以参观村庄周围的几口古老的盐井：留意大龙寺以南的黑牛井 （ 黑牛井 ，Hēiniú Jǐng）。

A small tourist office near the first bridge can point the way to the various sites.
第一座桥附近的一个小型旅游局可以指明前往各个景点的路线。

Wu Family CourtyardHISTORIC BUILDING
吴家庭院历史建筑

(武家大院, Wǔjiā Dàyuàn; %878 489 0358)

The best-known courtyard home in town was once owned by local salt magnate Wu Weiyang, who was summarily executed by communist forces in 1949. You can walk around the courtyard, or take tea here.
镇上最著名的四合院曾经是当地盐业大亨吴未央的主人，他于 1949 年被共产党军队即决处决。您可以在庭院里散步，也可以在这里喝茶。

Wang Family CourtyardINN¥
王家庭院酒店 ¥

(王家大院, Wángjiā Dàyuàn; %878 489 0506; r ¥100; W)

A family-run guesthouse, the rooms here are set around a pleasant courtyard. They’re not huge and the bathrooms are simple (squat toilets), but it’s a peaceful place and the courtyard is perfect for stargazing come nightfall.
这家家庭经营的宾馆，客房围绕着一个宜人的庭院。它们并不大，浴室也很简单（蹲式厕所），但这是一个宁静的地方，庭院非常适合夜幕降临时观星。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

The best option to reach Heijing is local train 6162 (¥22.50, three hours), departing Kunming at 6.54am and arriving at 10.04am. The train stops a couple of kilometres from the village but horse-drawn buggies and minivans (¥5 to ¥10 per person) meet the train to make the journey here. Going the other way, train 6161 departs at 8.39pm and reaches Kunming at 11.22pm.
前往黑井的最佳选择是当地 6162 号列车（22.50 日元，三小时），早上 6：54 从昆明出发，上午 10：04 到达。火车在距离村庄几公里的地方停靠，但马车和小型货车（每人5至10日元）会在这里。反过来，6161 次列车于晚上 8 点 39 分出发，晚上 11 点 22 分到达昆明。

The alternative is to take the frequent buses from Kunming (¥55) or Dali (¥75) to county capital Chuxiong (楚雄, Chǔxióng). From Chuxiong’s main bus station, take a taxi (¥15) to the east bus station (东客运站, dōng kèyùnzhàn), where there are buses to Heijing (¥19, 2½ hours) every hour between 9am and 3.55pm. From Heijing, buses to Chuxiong leave from outside the market at the end of the village from 6.40am to 2.30pm.
另一种选择是从昆明（55 日元）或大理（75 日元）乘坐频繁的巴士前往县城楚雄 （ 楚雄 ，Chǔxióng）。从楚雄的主要汽车站出发，乘坐出租车（15 日元）到东客运站（东客运站 ，dōng kèyùnzhàn），上午 9 点至下午 3 点 55 分之间每小时有一班前往黑井的巴士（19 日元，2 小时半）。从黑井出发，前往楚雄的巴士从村子尽头的市场外出发，时间为早上 6 点 40 分至下午 2 点 30 分。

Jianshui 建水
建水建水

%0873 / Pop 531,460
% 0873 / 人口 531,460

Jianshui (Jiànshuǐ) is a charming town of old buildings surrounded by a much larger modern city. The architecture is constantly being ‘facelifted’, but still retains much of its distinct character. The locals, who are a mix of Han, Hui and Yi, are friendly.
建水（Jiànshuǐ）是一个迷人的古老建筑小镇，周围环绕着一座更大的现代城市。该建筑不断被“改头换面”，但仍保留了其大部分独特的特征。当地人是汉族、回族和彝族的混血儿，他们很友好。

1Sights
1 景点

Classic architecture surrounds you here, and not just in the old-style back alleys. Virtually every main street has a historically significant traditional structure. The architecture is especially intriguing because of the obvious mixture of central plains and local styles. Many old buildings, despite official decrees positing them as state treasures, have been co-opted for other purposes, so the trick – and the fun – is trying to spot them.
经典建筑在这里包围着您，而不仅仅是在老式的后巷中。几乎每条主要街道都有具有历史意义的传统结构。这座建筑尤其耐人寻味，因为中原和地方风格的明显融合。许多旧建筑，尽管官方法令将它们定为国家宝藏，但已被用于其他目的，因此诀窍和乐趣在于试图发现它们。

Twin Dragon BridgeBRIDGE
双龙桥 BRIDGE

(双龙桥, Shuānglóng Qiáo; %873 766 4447)
（ 双龙桥 ，Shuānglóng Qiáo; % 873 766 4447）

This beautiful 30m bridge across the confluence of the Lu and Tachong Rivers features 17 arches, so many that it took two periods of the Qing dynasty to complete the project in 1839. It’s 3km from the western side of town. Minivans (¥3, 7am to 6pm) run here from Jianshui’s Hong Yun bus station, and will let travellers out at an intersection 300m from the bridge.
这座横跨潞江和大冲河交汇处的美丽 30 米大桥拥有 17 个拱门，数量之多，以至于清朝历时两个时期才在 1839 年完成该工程。距离城镇西侧3公里。小型货车（3 日元，早上 7 点至下午 6 点）从建水的红运汽车站出发，在距离大桥 300 米的十字路口让旅客下车。

Swallow’s CavernCAVE
燕子洞穴洞穴

(燕子洞, Yànzǐ Dòng; Highway 323, 323国道; ¥55; h9am-5pm)
（ 燕子洞 ，Yànzǐ Dòng;323 号公路，323 国道 ;55 日元; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）

Set inside a small nature reserve, this large cave complex is split into two – one high and dry, the other low and wet. The natural quiet of the popular wet cave is diluted a bit by bright neon lighting and a small shopping complex, as well as the drone of free motorboats that ferry tourists back to the cave mouth, but the hundreds of thousands of swallows flying around in spring and summer are a delightful touch of wildlife.
这个大型洞穴群坐落在一个小型自然保护区内，分为两部分——一个高而干燥，另一个低而湿。明亮的霓虹灯和小型购物中心，以及免费摩托艇的无人机将游客运送回洞口，这座受欢迎的湿洞的自然宁静被稀释了一点，但春夏两季飞来飞去的数十万只燕子却是野生动物的令人愉悦的一抹。

Zhu Family GardenHISTORIC SITE
朱家花园 HISTORIC SITE

(朱家花园, Zhūjiā Huāyuán; %873 766 7115; 16 Hanlin Jie, 翰林街16号; ¥35; h8am-8pm)
（ 朱家花园 ，Zhūjiā Huāyuán; % 873 766 7115;翰林街 16 号 ; ¥35; h 上午 8 点至晚上 8 点）

This spacious 20,000-sq-metre complex, which includes 42 separate courtyards, is a fascinating example of Qing-era architecture. Comprising ancestral buildings, family homes, ponds and lovely gardens, it took 30 years to build. The Zhu family made its fortune through its mill and tavern, and went on to dabble in everything from tin in Gejiu to opium in Hong Kong, eventually falling victim to the political chaos following the 1911 revolution.
这座占地 20,000 平方米的宽敞建筑群包括 42 个独立的庭院，是清代建筑的迷人典范。它包括祖传建筑、家庭住宅、池塘和美丽的花园，历时 30 年才建成。朱家通过磨坊和酒馆发家致富，并继续涉足从葛酒的锡到香港的鸦片，最终成为 1911 年革命后政治混乱的牺牲品。

Confucian TempleCONFUCIAN TEMPLE
孔庙 CONFUCIAN TEMPLE

(文庙, Wénmiào; %873 765 3333; Lin’an Lu, 临安路; ¥40; h8am-6.30pm)

Jianshui’s most famous temple was modelled after the temple in Confucius’ hometown of Qufu (Shandong province) and finished in 1285; it covers 7.5 hectares and is the third-largest Confucian temple in China. The temple operated as a school for nearly 750 years – its academic credentials were such that more than half of all Yunnan’s successful candidates in imperial examinations during this period came from Jianshui.
建水最著名的寺庙是仿照孔子家乡曲阜（山东省）的寺庙建造的，于 1285 年竣工;占地7.5公顷，是中国第三大孔庙。这座寺庙作为学校运营了近 750 年——其学历如此之高，以至于这一时期云南科举中合格者中有一半以上来自建水。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Typha Youth HostelHOSTEL¥
Typha 青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥

(草芽青年旅舍, Cǎoyá Qīngnián Lǚshě; %873 765 2451; yhajianshui@yahoo.com; 89 Ruyi Xiang, 如意巷89号; dm/s/d ¥30/70/90; aiW)
（ 草芽青年旅舍 ，Cǎoyá Qīngnián Lǚshě; % 873 765 2451;yhajianshui@yahoo.com;89 Ruyi Xiang， 如意巷 89 号 ;dm/s/d ¥30/70/90; a i W ）

This is a legit hostel with a cosy communal area, bike hire (¥30 per day) and sound travel advice; it’s also a good place to book a tour of the surrounding area. Dorms are clean and come with lockers; the private rooms are compact but OK.
这是一家合法的旅馆，设有舒适的公共区域、自行车租赁服务（每天 30 日元）和合理的旅行建议;这里也是预订周边地区旅游的好地方。宿舍很干净，配有储物柜;包间很紧凑，但还可以。

To find it, walk 30m west of the Confucian Temple and turn down an alley on the left-hand side of the road.
要找到它，请从孔庙以西步行 30m，然后沿着道路左侧的一条小巷拐下。

Lin’an InnINN¥¥
临安客栈¥¥

(临安客栈, Lín’ān Kèzhàn; %873 765 5866; linaninn@hotmail.com; 32 Hanlin Jie, 翰林街32号; r ¥238-328; aW)
（2015），Lín'ān Kèzhàn; % 873 765 5866;linaninn@hotmail.com;32 翰林杰， 32 2016;r μl 238-328; a W ）

In a prime location in the heart of the old town and with well-kept rooms. The biggest draw here is the great communal courtyard, which is very pleasant for a beer in the evening, but the rooms are comfortable too. It rents bikes for ¥30 per day.
位于老城区中心的黄金地段，拥有保存完好的客房。这里最大的吸引力是巨大的公共庭院，晚上喝啤酒非常愉快，但房间也很舒适。它以每天 30 日元的价格租用自行车。

Huáqīng JiǔdiànHOTEL¥¥
华庆街酒店 ¥¥

(华清酒店; %873 766 6166; 146 Hanlin Jie, 翰林街146号; r ¥188-328; aW)
( 华清酒店 % 873 766 6166; 146 Hanlin Jie, 翰林街 146 号 ; r ¥188-328; a W )

Decorated in a neo-Qing dynasty style, the rooms here are a nice size and some come with small terraces. The staff are friendly and offer a great English map of the old town.
这里的客房采用新清风格装饰，大小适中，部分客房设有小露台。工作人员很友好，提供老城区的精美英文地图。

5Eating
5 吃

Jianshui is legendary for its qìguō (汽锅), a stew often infused with medicinal herbs and served in earthenware pots. Expect to pay ¥40 to ¥50 per pot. Jianshui is also well-known for barbecue (烧烤, shāokǎo) and you’ll find many cubbyhole restaurants grilling away, particularly along Hanlin Jie.
建水以其汽锅而闻名， 这是一种通常加入药材的炖菜，装在陶罐中。预计每锅支付 40 至 50 日元。建水还以烧烤而闻名， 您会发现许多小房间餐厅都在烧烤，尤其是在翰林街沿线。

Āmáo Qīngzhēn ShāokǎoBARBECUE¥
Āmáo Qīngzhēn Shāokǎo 烧烤¥

(阿毛清真烧烤; %134 0892 7657; 6 Shuyuan Jie, 书院街6号; barbecue skewers from ¥2; h5pm-1am)
（ 阿毛清真烧烤 % 134 0892 7657; 6 Shuyuan Jie， 书院街 6 号 ; 烧烤串 ¥2 起; h 下午 5 点至凌晨 1 点）

This is the place to eat delicious barbecue on tiny stools. Everything – fish, meat, veggies, tofu – is on display, so just pick and choose. It’s tucked down an alley off Hanlin Jie south of the Zhu Family Garden. If you can’t find it, ask around: everyone knows it.
这是在小凳子上吃美味烧烤的地方。所有东西——鱼、肉、蔬菜、豆腐——都陈列在场，所以只需挑选即可。它隐藏在朱家花园以南翰林街旁的一条小巷里。如果找不到，请四处打听：每个人都知道。

Fújí CàiCHINESE¥¥
Fújí CàiCHINESE¥¥

(福籍菜; %873 765 5889; 363 Lin’An Lu, 临安路363号; mains ¥28-88; h9.30am-8.30pm)
（ 福籍菜 % 873 765 5889; 363 Lin'An Lu， 临安路 363 号 ; 主菜 ¥28-88; h 上午 9：30 至晚上 8：30）

Local delicacies, including the herbal stew qìguō (汽锅; ¥38) and a wide range of Chinese dishes served in a renovated courtyard home make this one of the nicer full-service restaurants in Jianshui. Find it around 350m west of the Confucian Temple.
当地美食，包括香草炖锅（ 汽锅 ，38 日元）和在经过翻修的四合院中供应的各种中式菜肴，使这家餐厅成为建水最好的全方位服务餐厅之一。在文庙以西约 350m 处找到它。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

BUS
总线

The main Jianshui bus station is 2km north of Chaoyang Gate. Buses to Swallow’s Cavern depart hourly from 7am (¥11, one hour), with the last returning from the caves at 7pm. Other destinations include the following:
建水汽车总站位于朝阳门以北2公里处。前往燕子洞穴的巴士从早上 7 点开始每小时一班（11 日元，一小时），最后一班车在晚上 7 点从洞穴返回。其他目的地包括：

Hekou ¥65 to ¥77, five hours, four daily (7.26am to 10.57am)
河口 65 至 77 日元，五小时，每天四小时（上午 7：26 至上午 10：57）

Jinghong ¥225, eight to ten hours, two daily (1pm & 4pm)
景红 ¥225，八到十小时，每天两次（下午 1 点和 4 点）

Kunming ¥81, three to four hours, 24 daily (7am to 7.35pm)
昆明 81 日元，三到四个小时，每天 24 天（早上 7 点至晚上 7 点 35 分）

Nansha ¥31, two to three hours, 12 daily (7.15am to 6.40pm)
南沙 31 日元，两到三个小时，每天 12 个（早上 7：15 至下午 6：40）

Xinjie ¥43, three hours (11.34am)
新街 43 日元，三小时（上午 11.34）

For local destinations, including the Twin Dragon Bridge, head to Hongyun Bus Station (红运客运站, Hóngyùn Kèyùnzhàn), just north of the old town’s north gate at the corner of Chaoyang Beilu and Beizheng Jie.
对于包括双龙桥在内的当地目的地，请前往红运客运站（红运客运站 ，Hóngyùn Kèyùnzhàn），该站位于朝阳北麓和北征街拐角处的老城北门以北。

TRAIN
火车

Six daily departures connect Jianshui’s train station to Kunming (1st/2nd class ¥95/59, two to three hours, 8.50am to 8.01pm); in the opposite direction three daily trains link the city to Hekou (hard/soft seat ¥30/47, two to three hours, 2.24pm to 6.26pm).
每天有六班车连接建水火车站和昆明（一等舱/二等舱 95/59 日元，两到三个小时，上午 8：50 至晚上 8：01）;相反方向，每天有三趟火车将城市与河口连接起来（硬座/软座 30/47 日元，两到三个小时，下午 2：24 至下午 6：26）。

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

Bus 919 (¥2) links the train station with the bus station and old town, while buses 13 and 15 link the bus station and old town. A taxi from the main bus station to the old town is ¥7.
919路公交车（2日元）连接火车站与汽车站和老城区，13路和15路公交车连接汽车站和老城区。从主要巴士站到老城区的出租车费用为 7 日元。

Yuanyang Rice Terraces 元阳
元阳梯田 元阳

%0873

Yuanyang (Yuányáng) is a wonderful region of hilltop villages and intricate rice terraces cascading down surrounding hillsides. It’s a palette of colours at sunrise and sunset, and a place for spirit-recharging treks through centuries-old rice-covered hills with a few water buffalo eyeing you contentedly nearby.
元阳（Yuányáng）是一个美妙的地区，拥有山顶村庄和错综复杂的水稻梯田，从周围的山坡上倾泻而下。这里是日出和日落时分的调色板，也是徒步穿越数百年历史的稻米覆盖的山丘，附近有几头水牛心满意足地注视着您，让您精神振奋。

Yes, it’s hard not to become indulgent when describing these tītián (梯田, rice terraces), hewn from the rolling topography by the Hani people throughout the centuries. They cover roughly 125 sq km and are one of Yunnan’s most stunning sights.
是的，在描述这些梯田（梯田 ，水稻梯田）时，很难不放纵，这些梯田是几个世纪以来哈尼人从连绵起伏的地形上凿成的。它们占地约 125 平方公里，是云南最令人惊叹的景点之一。

1Sights
1 景点

The terraces around dozens of outlying villages have their own special characteristics, often changing with the daylight. Bilingual maps are available at many hotels in town. Bear in mind that the terraces are at their most extraordinary in winter when they are flooded with water, which the light bounces off in spectacular fashion. Avoid visiting at Chinese public holidays, when prices for minibuses go sky-high (¥600 and more per day).
几十个边远村庄周围的梯田各具特色，经常随着日光的变化而变化。镇上的许多酒店都提供双语地图。请记住，梯田在冬天最为非凡，当它们被水淹没时，光线会以壮观的方式反射出来。避免在中国公共假期前往，因为此时小巴价格飞涨（每天 600 日元或更多）。

A combined ¥70 ticket gets you access to the Duoyishu, Bada, and Laohuzui terraces.
一张 70 日元的联票可让您进入多义树、巴达和老胡嘴梯田。

oBada Rice TerraceVIEWPOINT
o 巴达梯田观景台

(坝达梯田, Bàdá Tītián; combined ticket ¥70; h6am-8pm)
（ 坝达梯田 ，Bàdá Tītián;联票¥70; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8 点）

Bada is one of the finest rice terraces at Yuanyang to catch the sunset at. If you only have time for one terrace, this is it.
八大是鸳鸯最好的水稻梯田之一，可以欣赏日落。如果您只有一个露台的时间，那就是它了。

Duoyishu Rice TerraceVIEWPOINT
多义曙梯田观景台

(多依树梯田, Duōyīshù Tītián; combined ticket ¥70; h6am-8pm)
（ 多依树梯田 ， Duōyīshù Tītián;联票¥70; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8 点）

Located about 25km from Xinjie, this rice terrace has the most awesome sunrises. As it’s walking distance from Pugaolao it’s an easy choice for the morning.
距离新街约 25 公里，这个梯田拥有最美的日出。由于距离 Pugaolao 仅几步之遥，因此是早上的轻松选择。

Quanfuzhuang Rice TerraceVIEWPOINT
泉府庄梯田观景台

(全福庄梯田; Quánfúzhuāng Tītián) F
（ 全福庄梯田 ;Quánfúzhuāng Tītián） F

Quanfuzhuang is a less-crowded – and free – alternative to Duoyishu, and has easy access via trails that reach the terraces from near a roadside viewing platform.
全福庄是多义书之外人烟稀少且免费的替代方案，可通过路边观景台附近的小径轻松到达梯田。

Laohuzui Rice TerraceVIEWPOINT
老湖嘴梯田观景台

(老虎嘴梯田, Lǎohǔzuǐ Tītián; combined ticket ¥70; h6am-8pm)
（ 老虎嘴梯田 ，Lǎohǔzuǐ Tītián;联票¥70; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8 点）

Among the rice terraces at Yuanyang this was once one of the most mesmerising places to watch the sunset, but a recent landslide has sadly destroyed some of the surrounding terraces. It’s also known as Mengpin (勐品梯田, Měngpǐn Tītián), after the name of the closest village.
在鸳鸯的水稻梯田中，这里曾经是观赏日落最迷人的地方之一，但最近的山体滑坡遗憾地摧毁了周围的一些梯田。它也被称为勐品梯田（勐品梯田 ，Měngpǐn Tītián），以最近的村庄的名字命名。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Xinjie and Pugaolao have the greatest concentration of hotels and guesthouses. Of the two, Pugaolao is by far the nicer place to stay.
新街和蒲皋劳的酒店和宾馆最为集中。在两者中，Pugaolao 是迄今为止更好的住宿地点。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Xinjie is the main transport hub for the Yuanyang terraces, with daily buses from the bus station to and from Kunming, Jianshui and Hekou, as well as minivans to the surrounding villages. There are also many buses to the same destinations from Nansha, an hour away from Xinjie by minivan, where some buses to Yuanyang will deposit unsuspecting travellers.
新街是鸳鸯梯田的主要交通枢纽，每天有汽车站往返昆明、建水和河口的巴士，还有前往周边村庄的小型货车。从南沙出发，乘坐小型货车前往同一目的地的巴士也有很多，距离新街一个小时的路程，一些前往元阳的巴士会安置毫无戒心的旅客。

While buses run to all the villages from the bus station, you are much better off arranging your own transport, or hooking up with other travellers to split the cost of a sunrise or sunset drive. Minivans and motor-rickshaws congregate just below the hotel Yúntī Shùnjié Dàjiǔdiàn and on the street west of the bus station. Expect to pay ¥200 to ¥400 in peak season for a minivan for driving and a two-hour wait, depending on distance. Less comfortable motor-rickshaws can be had for ¥150 and up.
虽然巴士从巴士站开往所有村庄，但您最好安排自己的交通工具，或者与其他旅客联系以分摊日出或日落驾车的费用。小型货车和机动人力车聚集在 Yúntī Shùnjié Dàjiǔdiàn 酒店下方和汽车站西边的街道上。在旺季，预计需要支付 200 至 400 日元的小型货车驾驶费用，等待两个小时，具体取决于距离。不太舒适的人力车可以买到 150 日元及以上。

Xinjie 新街
Xinjie 新街

%0873 / Pop 74,575
% 0873 / 人口 74,575

Xinjie (Xīnjiē) makes a useful base for exploring the Yuanyang Rice Terraces, even if it is a bit grubby. The bus station is a minute’s walk uphill from Titian Sq, the town’s hub and a nice viewpoint for the surrounding hills.
新街 （Xīnjiē） 是探索鸳鸯梯田的有用基地，即使它有点肮脏。巴士站距离提香广场（Titian Sq）有几分钟的步行路程，提香广场是该镇的中心，是周围群山的美景。

Basic restaurants surround Titian Sq and the commercial pedestrian street down the stairs from here.
基本的餐厅环绕着提香广场和从这里走下楼梯的商业步行街。

Yúntī Shùnjié DàjiǔdiànHOTEL¥

(云梯顺捷大酒店; %873 562 1588; Titian Square, 梯田广场; d ¥136; W)

Just off Titian Sq and a few minutes from the bus station, this place is the best of the centrally located hotels. Rooms are clean and compact, but wi-fi is available only in the lobby. Prices go up during festival periods.
就在提香广场附近，距离巴士站只有几分钟的路程，这个地方是位于市中心的最好的酒店。房间干净紧凑，但 Wi-Fi 仅在大堂提供。节日期间价格会上涨。

Yǐngyǒuliàn JiǔdiànHOTEL¥

(影友恋酒店; %873 562 4591, 159 8737 4367; caihuimei2006@163.com; r ¥60-80; W)
（ 影友恋酒店 % 873 562 4591， 159 8737 4367;caihuimei2006@163.com;r ¥60-80; W ）

It’s basic (the price is a clue) and even a bit grimy, but some rooms have western toilets and the wi-fi connection is strong. Owner Belinda speaks English well and will help arrange transport to the outlying villages – she’s the real reason to stay. To get here, walk uphill from the bus station for 500m and it’s on your left.
它很基本（价格是线索），甚至有点脏，但有些房间有西式卫生间，Wi-Fi 连接很强。业主 Belinda 英语说得很好，会帮忙安排前往偏远村庄的交通——她是留下来的真正理由。要到达这里，请从公交车站上坡 500 米，它就在您的左边。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

There are two buses daily from Xinjie to Kunming (¥173, seven hours, 9.30am & 12.30pm), two to Hekou (¥60, six hours, 7.30am and 10.10am) and one to Jianshui (¥44, three hours, 4.30pm).
每天有两班从新街到昆明的巴士（173日元，7小时，上午9：30和中午12：30），两班到河口（60日元，6小时，早上7：30和10：10），以及一班到建水的巴士（44日元，三小时，下午4：30）。

Minivans leave when full from just outside the station to Duoyishu’s Pugaolao village (¥15) and down the hill to Nansha (¥15) from around 7.30am to 6pm. From Nansha, many more buses run to points around Yunnan and beyond, but for Xishuangbanna you’ll have to transfer in Jianshui.
小型货车满员后从车站外出发，前往多义树的蒲高劳村（15 日元），然后下山前往南沙（15 日元），时间为上午 7 点 30 分至下午 6 点左右。从南沙出发，还有更多的巴士开往云南周边及其他地区，但前往西双版纳，您必须在建水换乘。

Pugaolao 普高老
普高老

%0873 / Pop 980
% 0873 / 流行 980

In-the-know travellers base themselves in picturesque Pugaolao (Pǔgāolǎo) in Duoyishu (多依树, Duōyīshù), a Hani village an hour by minivan from Xinjie. The rice terraces are all around you here and when not gazing out on them, you can experience something of traditional village life as you dodge the water buffalo, chickens and pigs that wander the stone paths of the village and the mud walls of the surrounding terraces. It’s a perfect place for catching the sunrise from the roof of your guesthouse.
知情的旅行者将自己定居在多依树 （Duōyīshù）风景如画的普高劳（Pǔgāolǎo），这是一个哈尼村庄，距离新街有一小时的小型货车车程。这里的水稻梯田就在您周围，当不凝视它们时，您可以躲避在村庄石板路上徘徊的水牛、鸡和猪以及周围梯田的泥墙，体验一些传统的乡村生活。这是从宾馆屋顶欣赏日出的理想场所。

4Sleeping & Eating
4 睡眠和饮食

There are two restaurants on the main road above the village, but none in Pugaolao itself. All guesthouses offer meals, although they are often pricier than they would be elsewhere.
村子上方的主干道上有两家餐馆，但在普高劳本身却没有。所有宾馆都提供餐点，尽管它们通常比其他地方贵。

Sunny GuesthouseGUESTHOUSE¥
阳光宾馆 GUESTHOUSE¥

(多依树阳光客栈, Duōyīshù Yángguāng Kèzhàn; %159 8737 1311; sunny_guesthouse@163.com; dm ¥40, d ¥120-200; aW)
（ 多依树阳光客栈 ， Duōyīshù Yángguāng Kèzhàn; % 159 8737 1311;sunny_guesthouse@163.com;dm ¥40，d ¥120-200; a W ）

This guesthouse now offers quite a range of comfortable rooms, from those that have huge windows overlooking the rice terraces to ones with tiny windows facing the next building. There’s a roof terrace, a couple of communal areas and one large dorm that may or may not be in service when you visit. Friendly owner Lucian speaks excellent English.
这家宾馆现在提供各种舒适的客房，从有大窗户俯瞰水稻梯田的客房到有小窗户面向下一栋建筑的客房。这里有一个屋顶露台、几个公共区域和一个大型宿舍，当您访问时，它们可能会或可能不会使用。友好的业主 Lucian 会说一口流利的英语。

Belinda's BackpackersGuesthouse 宾馆¥

(影友漫步客栈, Yǐngyǒumànbù Kèzhàn; %159 8737 4367; caihuimei2006@163.com; dm/r ¥35/120; W)
（ 影友漫步客栈 ，Yǐngyǒumànbù Kèzhàn; % 159 8737 4367;caihuimei2006@163.com;DM/R ¥35/120; W ）

Like her operation in Xinjie, Belinda’s guesthouse in Pugaolao is a little rough-and-ready, but the private rooms have western toilets and Belinda’s tours of the area – especially some little-visited villages – get good feedback. It’s at the top of the village, just down from the highway.
与她在新街的经营一样，贝琳达在普高劳的宾馆有点简陋，但私人房间有西式厕所，贝琳达在该地区的旅行——尤其是一些人迹罕至的村庄——得到了很好的反馈。它位于村庄的顶部，就在高速公路的下方。

Timeless Hostel YuanyangHOSTEL¥
Timeless Hostel 圆阳青年旅舍 ¥

(久居元阳客栈, Jiǔ Jū Yuányáng Kèzhàn; %153 6837 6718; yuangyang.timeless@gmail.com; dm/d ¥45/120; nW)
（ 久居元阳客栈 ， Jiǔ Jū Yuányáng Kèzhàn; % 153 6837 6718;yuangyang.timeless@gmail.com;DM/D ¥45/120; n W ）

In the heart of the village, with fresh dorms and rooms, a roof terrace with decent views, an amiable communal area and English-speaking staff. Bikes can be hired for ¥30 per day and staff can offer advice on potential hiking routes, as well as organise transport to other villages.
位于村庄中心，拥有清新的宿舍和房间、可欣赏美景的屋顶露台、和蔼可亲的公共区域和会说英语的工作人员。可以以每天 30 日元的价格租用自行车，工作人员可以提供有关潜在远足路线的建议，并安排前往其他村庄的交通。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Minivans (¥15 per person, one hour) leave from outside Xinjie’s bus station from 6.30am to 6pm. They return to Xinjie on the the same schedule and can be hailed on the main road.
小型货车（每人 15 日元，一小时）从新街汽车站外出发，时间为早上 6：30 至下午 6 点。他们以相同的时间表返回新街，可以在主干道上招呼。

DON’T MISS
不要错过

VILLAGE MARKETS
乡村市场

Villages across Yuanyang play host to weekly morning markets, but the schedule changes based on the traditional Chinese zodiac, with different villages connected to different signs of the calendar. Ask at your guesthouse where to head on a given day.
元阳各地的村庄每周都会举办早市，但时间表会根据传统的十二生肖而变化，不同的村庄与不同的日历星座有关。询问您的宾馆某一天该去哪里。

Erhai Lake 洱海湖
洱海湖洱海湖

%0872

The seventh-largest freshwater lake in China, Erhai Lake (Ěrhǎi Hú; ‘Ear-Shaped’ Lake) covers 250 sq km. Beyond the well-known Dali Old Town it’s dotted with villages to visit and surrounded by a ring road great for bike rides, all with the verdant Cangshan Mountains towering in the background.
中国第七大淡水湖洱海（Ěrhǎi Hú;“耳朵形状”湖）占地 250 平方公里。除了著名的大理老城区之外，这里还点缀着可供参观的村庄，周围环绕着一条非常适合骑自行车的环路，背景是青翠的苍山山脉。

Caicun (才村, Cáicūn), a pleasant little village east of Dali (¥1.50 on bus 2), is a nexus of water transport. All boat travel is on ‘official’ vessels. Expect to pay ¥180 for a three-hour trip across the lake to the Luoquan Peninsula (罗荃半岛, Luōquán Bàndǎo). Catch bus 2 from Dali to get here; boats run roughly from 8.30am to 4.30pm.
才村 （ 才村 ，Cáicūn）是大理以东的一个宜人小村庄（乘坐 2 路公交车 1.50 日元），是水上交通的枢纽。所有乘船旅行都是在“官方”船只上进行的。预计需要支付 180 日元，即可穿越湖面前往罗荃半岛（罗荃半岛，Luōquán Bàndǎo）的三小时行程。从大理乘坐 2 路公交车到达这里;船只大约从上午 8.30 运行到下午 4.30。

On the east side of the lake, the beautiful waterside town of Shuanglang (双廊, Shuāngláng) is extremely popular with domestic tourists. The old town (¥10) is a labyrinth of winding old alleys and traditional homes sitting on a little peninsula that juts into the lake. A 2km pedestrian street leads to the ferry port and ticket office for Nanzhao Customs Island (南诏风情岛, Nánzhào Fēngqíng Dǎo; Shuanglang, 双廊). This pleasant island has gardens, parks, a 17.5m-tall marble statue of Avalokiteshvara (Chenresig; aka Guanyin) and a hotel. Boats to the island cost ¥50 per round-trip, which includes admission.
湖的东侧，美丽的水边小镇双廊 （ 双廊 ，Shuāngláng）极受国内游客的欢迎。老城区（10 日元）是一个迷宫般的，由蜿蜒的古老小巷和传统房屋组成，坐落在一个伸入湖中的小半岛上。一条 2 公里的步行街通往南诏风情岛 （Nánzhào Fēngqíng Dǎo;双朗， 双廊 ）.这个宜人的岛屿拥有花园、公园、17.5 米高的观世音菩萨（Chenresig，又名观音）大理石雕像和一家酒店。前往该岛的船票为每次往返 50 日元，包括门票。

The other east-side highlight, close to Wase, is Putuo Island (普陀岛, Pǔtuó Dǎo) and the 15th Century Lesser Putuo Temple (小普陀寺, Xiǎopǔtuó Sì; Putuo Island, 普陀岛), set on an extremely photogenic rocky outcrop. A taxi from Shuanglang is ¥50 each way, or else hire a bicycle and stop off along the way.
靠近和濑的另一个东侧亮点是普陀岛（普陀岛 ，Pǔtuó Dǎo）和 15 世纪的小普陀寺 （ 小普陀寺 ，Xiǎopǔtuó Sì;普陀岛， 普陀岛 ）， 坐落在极其上镜的岩石露头上。从双朗乘坐出租车单程 50 日元，或者租一辆自行车，沿途停下来。

Roads encircle the lake, so it’s possible to do a loop (or partial loop) of the lake by mountain bike. A bike path goes from Cai-cun to Tao Yuan Port, which makes a great day trip (though most travellers turn around at Xizhou). Some hardcore cyclists continue right around the lake; the full loop is around 98km. The lack of boats means you’re looking at an overnight stay or an extremely long ride in one day.
道路环绕着湖泊，因此可以骑山地自行车绕湖一圈（或部分环路）。一条自行车道从蔡村到桃园港，这是一个很棒的一日游（尽管大多数旅行者在西洲掉头）。一些铁杆骑自行车的人继续在湖边行驶;全环约 98 公里。没有船只意味着您要在一天内过夜或进行超长途旅行。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Xiaguan is the transport hub of the region, home to the train station and airport as well as a number of bus stations serving points near and far. Smaller towns, particularly Dali, also have limited services to locations in Yunnan.
下关是该地区的交通枢纽，拥有火车站和机场以及许多服务于远近点的汽车站。较小的城镇，尤其是大理，对云南地区的服务也有限。

Xiaguan 下关
Xiaguan 下关

%0872 / Pop 235,300
% 0872 / 人口 235,300

Xiaguan (Xiàguān), on the southern shore of Erhai Lake, is a transport hub for travellers headed to Dali Old Town a few kilometres further up the highway. Confusingly, Xiaguan is also often referred to as Dali (大理, Dàlǐ) on tickets, maps and buses.
下关（下关）位于洱海南岸，是前往高速公路上几公里处的大理老城区的旅客的交通枢纽。令人困惑的是，下关在车票、地图和公共汽车上也经常被称为大理（ 大理 ，Dàlǐ）。

There’s little reason to stay in Xiaguan – you only need to come here to catch a bus or train (or to extend a visa). If you’re waiting for a bus and need to eat, the roads close to the bus and train stations are jammed with restaurants offering similar menus.
没有理由留在下关——你只需要来这里搭乘公共汽车或火车（或延长签证）。如果您正在等公共汽车并需要吃饭，靠近公共汽车站和火车站的道路上挤满了提供类似菜单的餐馆。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

AIR
空气

Xiaguan airport (DLU) is 15km from the town centre. Buy air tickets online or at an agency in Dali Old Town. A handful of flights leave daily for Kunming (from ¥420); four fly to Guangzhou (from ¥952); six to Chengdu (from ¥742); three to Beijing (from ¥1272); and two to Xishuangbanna (from ¥560). In the high season service extends to other major Chinese airports – check online.
下关机场 （DLU） 距离市中心 15 公里。在线购买机票或在大理老城区的旅行社购买机票。每天有少数航班飞往昆明（420 日元起）;四班飞往广州（952 日元起）;六趟到成都（742 日元起）;三趟到北京（1272 日元起）;两个到西双版纳（560 日元起）。旺季时，服务延伸至中国其他主要机场 - 请在线查看。

Airport buses (¥15, 30 minutes) run to the train station from 6.30am to 4pm. Taxis cost ¥40 from Xiaguan or ¥100 from Dali.
机场巴士（15日元，30分钟）从早上6点30分到下午4点开往火车站。从下关乘坐出租车费用为 40 日元，从大理乘坐出租车费用为 100 日元。

BUS
总线

Remember that when departing, the easiest way to Kunming or Lijiang is to get a bus from Dali Old Town. Bus tickets for nearly all destinations can be booked in Dali – this is often the easiest way as it will save you a trip to Xiaguan (although you will pay a service fee of ¥10 to ¥15). Xiaguan has four bus stations.
请记住，出发时，前往昆明或丽江最简单的方式是从大理老城区乘坐巴士。在大理，几乎所有目的地的巴士票都可以预订——这通常是最简单的方法，因为它可以节省您前往下关的行程（尽管您需要支付 10 至 15 日元的服务费）。下关有四个公交站。

The following departures are from the Express Bus Station (快速汽车客运站, Kuàisù Qìchē kèyùnzhàn):
以下班次从快速汽车客运站 （Kuàisù Qìchē kèyùnzhàn）出发：

如果你想去景洪 （220 日元，12 小时，8.20am、9.40am 和 11am），你需要火车站东北边的大理汽车客运站 （Dàlǐ Qìchē Kèyùnzhàn）。

Bus 8 to Dali Old Town (¥3, 35 minutes) leavebs from a handful of locations. Bus 8 runs from the train station to the north bus station and on to a car park at the north of the Dali Old Town.
