Within Xiaguan, Bus 21 (¥2) connects the train station, express bus station and south bus station.
在下关内，21路公交车（2元）连接火车站、高速巴士站和汽车南站。

TRAIN
火车

Xiaguan’s train station is called ‘Dali’, and all trains stop here; there is no station in the Old Town.
下关的火车站叫'大理'，所有火车都停在这里;老城区没有车站。

There are 24 trains daily to Kunming’s main train station (1st/2nd class ¥231/145, two hours, 7.40am to 9.14pm); three daily to Guangzhou (1st/2nd class ¥943/590, twelve hours, 10.05am to 11.53am); and five trains daily to Lijiang (hard/soft seat ¥34/49, two to three hours, 10.18am to 6.06pm).
每天有24趟火车前往昆明火车总站（一等/二等231/145日元，两小时，早上7：40至晚上9：14）;每天三班到广州（一等舱/二等舱 ¥943/590，十二小时，上午 10：05 至上午 11：53）;每天有五趟火车开往丽江（硬/软座 34/49 日元，两到三个小时，上午 10：18 至下午 6：06）。

Weishan 巍山
Weishan 巍山

%0872 / Pop 46,470
% 0872 / 人口 46,470

Weishan (Wēishān) is the heart of a region populated by Hui and Yi, once the centre of the powerful Nanzhao kingdom; from here the Hui rebel Du Wenxiu led an army in the Panthay Rebellion revolt against the Qing in the 19th century.
微山（Wēishān）是回夷聚居地区的中心，曾经是强大的南诏王国的中心;19 世纪，回族叛乱者杜文秀率军参加了反清的班塞起义。

Today it’s an attractive and relaxed small town of narrow streets lined with traditional wooden houses, with drum and bell towers at strategic points and a lovely backdrop of the surrounding hills. It’s still unspoiled and largely off the traveller map – surprising, given the proximity to Xiaguan.
如今，它已成为一个迷人而轻松的小镇，狭窄的街道两旁是传统的木屋，鼓楼和钟楼位于战略要地，周围群山的美丽背景。它仍然没有受到破坏，而且基本上不在旅行者的地图上——考虑到靠近下关，这令人惊讶。

1Sights
1 景点

The town’s central point and entrance to the old town is the unmistakable Gongchen Tower (拱辰楼, Gǒngchén Lóu; 93 Bei Jie, 北街93号; h9am-5pm) F. South from here you’ll come first to Xinggong Tower (星拱楼, Xīnggǒng Lóu), and then on the right-hand side of the street to Menghua Old Home (蒙化老家, Mēnghuà Lǎojiā; 8 Nan Jie, 南街8号; ¥10; h8.30am-9pm), the town’s best-preserved slice of architecture. Make sure to check out the town’s sizeable and well-preserved Confucius Temple (文庙, Wénmiào; %872 612 7287; Xi Jie, 西街; ¥3; h8.30am-5.30pm): turn right at Xinggong Tower and follow West Street to find it.
该镇的中心点和老城区的入口是拱辰楼 （ 拱辰楼 ，Gǒngchén Lóu;93 Bei Jie， 北街 93 号 h 9am-5pm）。 F 从这里向南走，首先是星拱楼 ， 然后在街道的右手边是蒙化老家（蒙化老家 ，Mēnghuà Lǎojiā;8 Nan Jie， 南街 8 号 ;¥10; h 上午 8.30 至晚上 9 点）， 这是该镇保存最完好的建筑。一定要看看小镇上规模庞大且保存完好的孔子庙 （ 文庙 ，Wénmiào; % 872 612 7287;习姐， 西街 ; ¥3; h 8.30am-5.30pm）：在行公楼右转，沿西街行驶即可找到。

Small villages surrounding Weishan are full of historic architecture and the 23 distinct ethnic groups that live in the county. Nearby Donglianhua (东莲花, Dōngliánhuā) has preserved several stunning examples of the village’s Tea Horse Road architectural heritage, built by the area’s Muslim-majority Hui ethnic group.
微山周围的小村庄充满了历史建筑和居住在该县的 23 个不同民族。附近的东莲花 （ 东莲花 ，Dōngliánhuā）保存了该村茶马路建筑遗产的几座令人惊叹的例子，由该地区穆斯林占多数的回族建造。

Nanzhao MuseumMUSEUM
南诏博物馆 MUSEUM

(南诏博物馆, Nánzhào Bówùguǎn; %872 612 2523; 1 Baguo Jie, 报国街1号; h9am-4pm) F

Architecture and artefacts describe the rise and importance of the Nanzhao kingdom, as well as offer brief introductions to the many ethnic groups that inhabit the region, using surprisingly good multilingual signage. Look for a sign just south of the Gongchen Tower that points the way.
建筑和手工艺品描述了南诏王国的兴起和重要性，并使用令人惊讶的优质多语言标牌简要介绍了居住在该地区的许多民族。在拱辰塔南边寻找一个指示方向的标志。

Wēibǎo ShānMOUNTAIN
Wēibǎo Shān 山

(巍宝山; %872 218 1798; ¥60)
( 巍宝山 % 872 218 1798; ¥60)

Weibao Mountain, about 10km south of Weishan, has a relatively easy hike to its peak at around 2500m. During the Ming and Qing dynasties it was the zenith of China’s Taoism, and you’ll find some superb Taoist murals; the most significant are at Wenchang Palace (文昌宫, Wénchāng Gōng) and Changchun Cave (长春洞, Chángchún Dòng). Birders in particular love the mountain; the entire county is a node on an international birding flyway.
渭堡山位于微山以南约 10 公里处，距离山顶 2500 米左右，徒步相对容易。在明清时期，这里是中国道教的顶峰，您会发现一些精美的道教壁画;最重要的是文昌宫 （ 文昌宫 ，Wénchāng Gōng）和长春洞 （ 长春洞 ，Chángchún Dòng）。观鸟者特别喜欢这座山;整个县是国际观鸟迁徙路线上的一个节点。

There are no buses here. Head to the street running east of Gongchang Tower in Weishan to pick up a taxi to the mountain, or ask your hotel to arrange one. Expect to pay ¥100 to ¥150 for the round trip; you’ll need the driver to wait for you.
这里没有公共汽车。前往微山拱昌楼以东的街道上打车上山，或者请酒店安排出租车。预计往返费用为 100 至 150 日元;您需要司机等您。

4Sleeping & Eating
4 睡眠和饮食

Línyè BīnguǎnHOTEL¥

(林业宾馆; %872 612 0761; 24 Xixin Jie, 西新街24号; d ¥150-200; aW)
( 林业宾馆 % 872 612 0761; 24 Xixin Jie, 西新街 24 号 ; d ¥150-200; a W )

A few minutes’ walk west of the Gongchang Tower, with big rooms and a strong wi-fi connection. Staff are friendly, if not exactly helpful.
从公昌楼向西步行几分钟，房间很大，Wi-Fi 连接很强。工作人员很友好，即使不是完全乐于助人。

BáilùyuánGUESTHOUSE¥¥
BáilùyuánGUESTHOUSE¥¥

(白露原; %152 1950 0258; 19 Bei Jie, 北街19号; r ¥300; W)
（ 白露原 % 152 1950 0258; 19 bei Jie， 北街 19 号 ; r ¥300; W ）

Out front this is a lovely teahouse which opens in the afternoon and also serves coffee and juices, but out back you can stay in what’s effectively your own little courtyard home, with a small garden and a very comfortable and tastefully decorated loft bedroom. It’s not always open if there are no guests, so call ahead.
前面是一个可爱的茶馆，下午开放，还供应咖啡和果汁，但在后面，您可以住在实际上是您自己的小庭院里，有一个小花园和一间非常舒适且装饰高雅的阁楼卧室。如果没有客人，它并不总是开放，所以请提前打电话。

Lǎowáng Guòjiāng ĚrsīYUNNAN¥
Lǎowáng Guòjiāng Ěrsī 云南¥

(老王过江饵丝; 160 Bei Jie, 北街160号; mains ¥11-22; h7am-3pm)

Your options here are small, medium, or large: there’s only one dish on the menu at Weishan’s most highly recommended restaurant for ĕrsī (饵丝) rice noodles. Dip the cut noodles in the broth and slurp it all up together at this busy shop 100m north of the Xinggong Tower.
这里的选择有小号、中号或大号：在魏山最值得推荐的餐厅，菜单上只有一道菜是 ĕrsī （ 饵丝 ） 米粉。将切好的面条浸入肉汤中，然后在兴功楼以北 100 米处的这家繁忙商店一起啜饮。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Xiaguan’s Xingsheng bus station has buses to Weishan (¥17, 1½ hours, every 20 to 30 minutes, 7am to 6.45pm). The last return to Xiaguan is 5.30pm.
下关兴盛汽车站有前往微山的巴士（17日元，11/2小时，每20至30分钟一班，早上7点至下午6点45分）。最后返回下关的时间是下午 5 点 30 分。

No public transport runs to Weibao Mountain, but a private taxi return with around three hours of waiting time should cost ¥100 to ¥150.
没有公共交通工具可以到达魏堡山，但乘坐私人出租车返回，等待时间约为 3 小时，费用为 100 至 150 日元。

Dali Old Town 大理古城
Dali Old Town 大理古城

%0872 / Pop 82,570
% 0872 / 人口 82,570

Dali Old Town (Dàlǐ Gǔchéng), the original backpacker hang-out in Yunnan, was once the place to chill, with its stunning location sandwiched between mountains and Erhai Lake. Loafing here for a couple of weeks was once an essential part of the Yunnan experience.
大理老城区（Dàlǐ Gǔchéng）是云南最初的背包客聚会场所 ，曾经是放松的地方，其地理位置优越，夹在群山和洱海之间。在这里闲逛几周曾经是云南体验的重要组成部分。

In recent years, domestic tourists have discovered Dali in a big way and the scene has changed accordingly. Instead of dreadlocked westerners, it’s young Chinese who walk around with flowers in their hair, and facelifts of the old town proceed apace.
近年来，国内游客大举发现大理，场景也随之发生了变化。不是留着辫子的西方人，而是年轻的中国人，他们头上插着鲜花四处走动，老城区的整容工作正在迅速进行。

Surrounding Dali there are fascinating possibilities for exploring, especially by bicycle and in the mountains above the lake. Or you can do what travellers have done here for years – eat, drink and make merry.
大理周围有迷人的探索可能性，尤其是在骑自行车和湖上的山上。或者你可以做旅行者多年来在这里所做的事情——吃喝玩乐。

History
历史

Dali lies on the western edge of Erhai Lake at an altitude of 1900m, with a backdrop of the imposing 4000m-tall Cang Shan (Green Mountains). For much of the five centuries in which Yunnan governed its own affairs, Dali was the centre of operations, and the old city retains a historical atmosphere that is hard to come by in other parts of China.
大理位于洱海西缘，海拔1900米，背景是4000米高的苍山。在云南自治的五个世纪的大部分时间里，大理一直是活动中心，老城保留了中国其他地区难以获得的历史氛围。

The main inhabitants of the region are the Bai, who number about 1.5 million and are thought to have settled the area some 3000 years ago. In the early 8th century they succeeded in defeating the Tang imperial army before establishing the Nanzhao kingdom, which lasted until the Mongol hordes arrived in the mid-13th century.
该地区的主要居民是拜族，人数约为 150 万，据信大约 3000 年前就在该地区定居。8世纪初，他们成功击败了唐朝皇军，建立了南诏王国，一直持续到13世纪中叶蒙古大军的到来。

1Sights
1 景点

Three PagodasBUDDHIST PAGODA
三塔 BUDDHIST PAGODA

(三塔寺, Sān Tǎ Sì; %872 266 6158; www.dalisanta.net; 214 Guodao, 214国道; ¥75; h7am-7pm)
（ 三塔寺 ，Sān Tǎ Yes; % 872 266 6158;www.dalisanta.net;214 国道，214 国道 ;¥75; h 上午 7 点至晚上 7 点）

Absolutely the symbol of the town and region, these pagodas, a 2km walk north of the north gate, are among the oldest standing structures in southwestern China. The tallest of the three, Qianxun Pagoda, has 16 tiers that reach a height of 70m. It was originally erected in the mid-9th century by engineers from Xi’an. It is flanked by two smaller 10-tiered pagodas, each of which are 42m high. Guided tours in English are available from ¥120.
这些宝塔绝对是城镇和地区的象征，位于北门以北 2 公里处，是中国西南部最古老的现存建筑之一。三座塔中最高的千寻塔有 16 层，高度可达 70m。它最初是由西习安的工程师于 9 世纪中叶竖立的。它的两侧是两座较小的 10 层宝塔，每座宝塔高 42 米。英语导游服务 120 日元起。

While the price is cheeky considering you can’t go inside the pagodas, Chongsheng Temple (崇圣寺, Chóngshèng Sì) behind them has been rebuilt to an incredible degree along the design of the destroyed Nanzhao-era original, and is well worth exploring. Just inside the main entrance, the Chong Sheng Vegetarian Buffet serves lunch (¥20, 11.30am to 1pm).
虽然考虑到你不能进入宝塔内部，价格很厚颜无耻，但它们后面的崇圣寺 （ 崇圣寺 ，Chóngshèng Sì）已经按照被毁坏的南昭时代原件的设计重建得令人难以置信，非常值得探索。就在正门内，Chong Sheng 素食自助餐供应午餐（20 日元，上午 11：30 至下午 1 点）。

Dali Catholic ChurchCHURCH
大理天主教堂 CHURCH

(map Google map; 大理天主教堂, Dali Tiānzhǔ Jiàotáng; 6 Xinmin Lu, 新民路6号) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 大理天主教堂 ，Dali Tiānzhǔ Jiàotáng;6 Xinmin Lu， 新民路 6 号 ） F

It’s worth checking out Dali’s Catholic Church. Dating back to 1927, it’s a beautiful blend of Bai-style architecture and classic Christian theology and church design. Mass is held here every Sunday at 9.30am.
值得一看大理的天主教堂。它的历史可以追溯到 1927 年，是白族风格建筑与经典基督教神学和教堂设计的完美融合。每周日上午 9 点 30 分在这里举行弥撒。

Dali Confucian TempleCONFUCIAN TEMPLE
大理文庙 CONFUCIAN TEMPLE

(map Google map; 文庙, Wénmiào; 42 Yita Lu, 一塔路42号; h7.30am-9.30pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 文庙 ，文庙;一塔路 42 号 h 7.30am-9.30pm） F

Dali’s attractive Confucian Temple is a 2014 reconstruction on the site of the original Qing dynasty structure, but the grounds are peaceful and there are small museum exhibits inside that are worth a look.
大理迷人的文庙是 2014 年在清代原建筑旧址上重建的，但场地很宁静，里面有小型博物馆展品，值得一看。

Dali Municipal MuseumMUSEUM
大理市立博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 大理市博物馆, Dàlǐ Shì Bówùguǎn; 111 Fuxing Lu, 复兴路111号; h9am-5pm) F

The museum houses a small collection of archaeological pieces relating to Bai history, including some fine figurines. English descriptions are lacking, but the ambience is nice.
博物馆收藏了少量与白族历史相关的考古文物，包括一些精美的雕像。缺乏英文描述，但氛围很好。

zFestivals & Events
z 节日和活动

Third Moon FairCULTURAL
第三届月博会文化

(三月节, Sānyuè Jié)

Merrymaking – along with endless buying, selling and general horse-trading (but mostly partying) – takes place during the Third Moon Fair, which begins on the 15th day of the third lunar month (usually April) and ends on the 21st day.
在农历三月十五日（通常是四月）开始，到二十一日结束，三月会期间都会进行欢乐活动，以及无休止的买卖和一般马匹交易（但主要是派对）。

Three Temples FestivalCULTURAL
三庙节文化

(绕三灵, Ràosān Líng)

The Three Temples Festival is held between the 23rd and 25th days of the fourth lunar month (usually May).
三庙节在农历四月二十三日至二十五日（通常是五月）之间举行。

The first day starts at Dali’s south gate and ends at Sacred Fountainhead Temple (Shèngyuán Sì) in Xizhou, where there is all-night dancing and singing. From there, revellers move on to Jīnguì Temple (Jīnguì Sì), before returning by way of Majiuyi Temple (Mǎjiǔyì Sì).
第一天从大理南门开始，到西州圣泉寺（Shèngyuán Sì）结束，那里通宵跳舞和唱歌。从那里，狂欢者前往 Jīnguì 寺 （Jīnguì Sì），然后经马九义寺 （Mǎjiǔyì Sì） 返回。

Torch FestivalCULTURAL
火炬节文化

(火把节, Huǒbǎ Jié)

The Torch Festival is held on the 24th and 25th days of the sixth lunar month (normally July) and is likely to be the best photo op in the province. Flaming torches are paraded at night through homes and fields. Locals throw pine resin at the torches, causing minor explosions everywhere. According to one local guesthouse owner, ‘it’s total madness’.
火把节在农历六月二十四和二十五日（通常为七月）举行，很可能是该省最好的拍照地点。夜间，燃烧的火把在房屋和田野中游行。当地人向火把扔松脂，到处都引起小爆炸。据一位当地宾馆老板说，“这完全是疯狂的”。

4 睡眠

5Eating
5 吃

Bai food makes excellent use of local flora and fauna. Specialities include rǔbǐng (goat’s cheese) and ěr kuài (饵块; toasted rice ‘cakes’). Given the proximity of Erhai Lake, try shāguō yú (沙锅鱼), a claypot fish casserole/stew made from salted Erhai Lake carp – and, as a Bai touch, magnolia petals.
白菜充分利用了当地的动植物。特色菜包括 rǔbǐng（山羊奶酪）和 ěr kuài（ 饵块 ;烤米饼“）。由于靠近洱海，可以尝试一下沙锅鱼 ，这是一种用咸洱海鲤鱼制成的煲仔鱼煲/炖菜，以及木兰花瓣。

Bakery No 88CAFE¥

(map Google map; 88号西点店, Bāshíbā Hào Xīdiǎndiàn; %872 267 9129; 17 Renmin Lu, 人民路17号; meals from ¥25; h8.30am-9.45pm; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ;88 号西点店 ，Bāshíbā Hào Xīdiǎndiàn; % 872 267 9129; 17 人民路 17 号 ; 餐食 25 元起; h 上午 8.30 至晚上 9.45; W ）

Spread across two floors and with a small garden, this popular, smoke-free haven of tranquillity has excellent sandwiches, pastas and soups, all prepared with local produce, as well as fine breads and cakes. It also sells German sausages and beer.
这个受欢迎的无烟宁静天堂分布在两层楼，设有一个小花园，提供美味的三明治、意大利面和汤，全部采用当地食材烹制而成，还有精美的面包和蛋糕。它还出售德国香肠和啤酒。

Méizi JǐngYUNNAN¥¥

This charmingly authentic Bai restaurant is composed of three grey-brick courtyards each containing small seating nooks where you can feast on traditional local cuisine. The English menu features some erratic translations (‘garlic loofah tip’, anyone?), but the ‘braised chicken’ or ‘wild mushroom’ dishes are both fine starting points, as are the small bottles of aged house-made plum liquor.
这家迷人的正宗白餐厅由三个灰砖庭院组成，每个庭院都设有小座位角落，您可以在那里享用传统的当地美食。英文菜单有一些不稳定的翻译（“大蒜丝瓜络尖”，有人吗？），但“红烧鸡”或“野生蘑菇”菜肴都是很好的起点，小瓶陈年自制梅酒也是如此。

它隐藏在菜市场对面的人民路。

Look for occasionally innovative combinations of all-organic Yunnan ingredients sourced from the proprietors’ own farm outside Dali. It features an open kitchen, faux-rustic design and a large outside area to eat in. The starters don’t really deliver but the mains are a hit.
偶尔寻找来自大理郊外自有农场的全有机云南食材的创新组合。它设有开放式厨房、仿质朴设计和宽敞的户外用餐区。启动器并没有真正交付，但电源很受欢迎。

WORTH A TRIP
值得一游

MARKETS AROUND DALI
大利周边市场

Travellers have a market to go to nearly every day of the week. Every Monday at Shaping (沙坪), about 30km north of Dali, there is a colourful Bai market (Shāpíng Gǎnjí). From 10am to 2.30pm you can buy everything from food products and clothing to jewellery and local batik.
旅行者几乎一周中的每一天都有一个市场可以去。每周一，在大理以北约 30 公里处的沙坪（Sha 坪），都会有一个色彩缤纷的白市（Shāpíng Gǎnjí）。从上午 10 点到下午 2.30，您可以购买从食品和服装到珠宝和当地蜡染的各种商品。

Regular buses to Shaping (¥11, one hour) leave from just outside the west gate. By bike, it will take about two hours at a good clip.
前往整形的定期巴士（11日元，1小时）从西门外出发。骑自行车大约需要两个小时。

Markets also take place in Shuanglang (双廊, Shuāng Láng; Tuesday), Shaba (沙坝, Shābà; Wednesday), Yousuo (右所, Yòusuǒ; Friday morning) and Jiangwei (江尾, Jiāngwěi; Saturday). Xizhou (喜洲, Xǐzhōu) and Zhoucheng (州城, Zhōuchéng) have daily morning and afternoon markets, respectively. Wase (挖色, Wāsè) also has a popular market every five days with trading from 9am to 4.30pm. Thanks to the lack of boats, travellers now have to slog to Xiaguan’s east bus station for buses to Wase (¥20).
双廊 （ 双廊 ，Shuāng Láng;星期二）、 沙坝 （ 沙坝 ，Shābà;星期三）、 优梭 （ 右所 ，Yòusuǒ;周五早上）和江尾 （ 江尾 ，Jiāngwěi;星期六）。 喜洲和州城分别有每日早市和午市。Wase（ 挖色 ，Wāsè）每五天有一个受欢迎的市场，交易时间为上午 9 点至下午 4.30。由于缺乏船只，旅客现在不得不艰难地前往下关东巴士站乘坐前往和濑的巴士（20 日元）。

Many guesthouses and hostels in Dali offer tours or can arrange transport to these markets for around ¥150 per half-day.
大理的许多宾馆和旅馆都提供旅游服务，或者可以安排前往这些市场的交通服务，费用约为每半天 150 日元。

6Drinking & Nightlife
6 饮酒与夜生活

Tang CafeCAFE
唐咖啡馆 CAFE

(map Google map; 唐咖, Táng Kā; %872 256 0560; 350 Renmin Lu Zhongduan, 人民路中段350号; h9am-10pm; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 唐咖 ，Táng Kā; % 872 256 0560;350 Renmin Lu Zhongduan， 人民路中段 350 号 h 9am-10pm; W ）

One sip of the flat white here and you’ll swear you’re in Melbourne, or at least Sydney. A rooftop terrace sweetens the deal, as does a small but tempting brunch menu.
在这里喝一口纯白葡萄酒，你就会发誓你在墨尔本，或者至少在悉尼。屋顶露台让交易变得甜蜜，小而诱人的早午餐菜单也是如此。

Craft Beer HouseCRAFT BEER
精酿啤酒屋 CRAFT BEER

(map Google map; 182 Pingdeng Lu, 平等路182号; h1pm-4am; W)
（ 地图 Google map; 182 Pingdeng Lu， 平等路 182 号 h 1pm-4am; W ）

In a quiet corner of the old town, this fun place carries European and American craft brews plus some locally produced ‘foreign’ options (¥39 to ¥69). There are no Chinese craft beers, unfortunately, but there’s live music sometimes. It’s the kind of bar you’d open for your friends to hang out at, which appears to be exactly the story here.
在老城区一个安静的角落，这个有趣的地方出售欧洲和美国的精酿啤酒以及一些当地生产的“外国”啤酒（39 至 69 日元）。不幸的是，这里没有中国精酿啤酒，但有时会有现场音乐表演。这是你会开给朋友闲逛的那种酒吧，这似乎正是这里的故事。

Chateau PiratesCRAFT BEER
海盗城堡精酿啤酒

(map Google map; 海盗酒堡, Hǎidào Jiǔbǎo; %189 8723 1290; 55-2 Nan Yeyu Lu, 叶榆路南55-2号; h4pm-12.30am; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 海盗酒堡 ， Hǎidào Jiǔbǎo; % 189 8723 1290;叶榆路南 h 南野玉路 55-2 号 4pm-12.30am; W ）

Chinese craft beer (including one Dali offering) from a hole-in-the-wall taproom with just a few barstools and one tiny table. If you’re peckish, the place next door will bring over fish ’n’ chips and bacon sandwiches.
中国精酿啤酒（包括一种大理啤酒）来自一个只有几张高脚凳和一张小桌子的破洞酒吧。如果你饿了，隔壁的地方会送来炸鱼薯条和培根三明治。

7Shopping
7 购物

Dali is famous for its marble blue-and-white batik printed on cotton and silk. There are many clothes shops around Dali. Most can also make clothing to your specifications – which will come as a relief when you see how small some of the ready-made items are.
大理以其印在棉和丝绸上的大理石蓝白蜡染而闻名。大理周边有很多服装店。大多数人还可以根据您的规格制作衣服——当您看到一些现成的物品有多小时，这会让人松一口气。

8Information
8 信息

All hostels and guesthouses and many hotels offer travel advice, arrange tours and book tickets for onward travel. There are also numerous travel agencies and cafes that will book bus tickets and offer all manner of tours. They can be expensive unless you can get a group together.
所有旅馆和宾馆以及许多酒店都提供旅行建议、安排旅游和预订后续旅行的机票。还有许多旅行社和咖啡馆可以预订巴士票并提供各种旅游。除非你能把一个小组聚集在一起，否则它们可能会很昂贵。

Bank of China (中国银行, Zhōngguó Yínháng; %872 266 0191; 333 Fuxing Lu, 复兴路333号; h9am-5pm Mon-Fri) Changes cash and travellers cheques, and has an ATM that accepts all major credit cards.
中国银行 （ 中国银行 ，Zhōngguó Yínháng; % 872 266 0191; 复兴路 333 号 h 周一至周五上午 9 时至下午 5 时 ）兑换现金和旅行支票，并设有接受所有主要信用卡的自动取款机。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

The golden rule: almost all buses advertised to Dali actually go to Xiaguan. Coming from Lijiang and Shangri-la, most Xiaguan-bound buses stop at the eastern end of Dali Old Town to let passengers off before continuing on to Xiaguan’s north bus station.
黄金法则：几乎所有广告开往大理的公交车实际上都开往下关。从丽江和香格里拉出发，大多数开往下关的巴士在大理老城区东端停靠乘客，然后继续前往下关北站。

From Kunming’s west bus station there are numerous buses to Dali (¥110 to ¥160, four to five hours, every 30 minutes from 7.15am to 7.20pm). Heading north, it’s easiest to pick up a bus on the roads outside the west or east gates; buy your ticket in advance from your guesthouse or a travel agent and they’ll make sure you get on the right one. (You could hail one yourself to save a surcharge but you’re not guaranteed a seat.)
从昆明西汽车站出发，有许多巴士前往大理（110 至 160 日元，4 至 5 小时，从早上 7：15 到晚上 7：20，每 30 分钟一班）。向北行驶，最容易在西门或东门外的道路上乘车;提前从宾馆或旅行社购买机票，他们会确保您乘坐正确的机票。（您可以自己叫一辆以节省附加费，但不能保证有座位。

From Dali Old Town (near the west gate) you can catch a bus to Kunming for ¥150; it runs seven times a day. There are also frequent buses from the old town to Lijiang (¥80) and Shangri-la (¥110).
从大理老城区（西门附近）出发，可以乘坐巴士前往昆明，费用为 150 日元;它每天运行七次。从老城区到丽江（80 日元）和香格里拉（110 日元）的巴士也很频繁。

Buses run regularly to Xizhou (¥7, 30 minutes) and other local destinations from outside the west gate.
从西门外有定期开往西州（7 日元，30 分钟）和其他当地目的地的巴士。

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

From Dali, a taxi to Xiaguan airport takes 45 minutes and costs around ¥100; to Xiaguan’s train station it costs ¥50.
从大理乘坐出租车到下关机场需要 45 分钟，费用约为 100 日元;到下关火车站的费用为 50 日元。

Bikes and scooters are the best way to get around and can be hired at numerous places from ¥40 to ¥180 per day; higher-priced scooter rentals have a larger battery capacity and can make longer trips. Try the scooter rental (出租大功率电动车, Chūzū Dàgōnglǜ Diàndòngchē; %138 8725 8079; Bo’ai Lu; rental per day ¥50-120; h8am-8pm) stand on Bo’ai Lu.
自行车和踏板车是最好的出行方式，可以在许多地方租用，每天 40 日元到 180 日元不等;价格较高的踏板车租赁具有更大的电池容量，并且可以进行更长的旅行。试试滑板车租赁 （ 出租大功率电动车 ， Chūzū Dàgōnglǜ Diàndòngchē; % 138 8725 8079;博爱卢;每天租金 ¥50-120; h 上午 8 点至晚上 8 点） 站在博爱路。

Buses (¥2, 30 minutes) marked 大理 (Dàlǐ) run between the old town and Xiaguan from as early as 6.30am to around 7pm; wait along the highway and flag one down.
标有大理 （Dàlǐ）的巴士（2 日元，30 分钟）从早上 6 点 30 分到晚上 7 点左右往返于老城区和下关之间;沿着高速公路等待，然后标记一个下来。

Bus 4 (¥2, 30 minutes) travels between Dali’s west gate and Xiaguan’s North Bus Station.
4路公交车（2日元，30分钟）往返于大理西门和下关汽车北站之间。

Bus 8 runs between Dali’s east gate and central Xiaguan (¥3, 45 minutes), passing close to the North, Express and Xingsheng bus stations, then terminating at the Xiaguan Train Station. There is also a bus marked Dali Special Service (大理专线, Dàlǐ Zhuānxiàn) that runs past the west gate to and from the train station every 15 to 20 minutes from 6.30am (¥5, 30 minutes).
8 路公交车往返于大理东门和下关市中心之间（3 日元，45 分钟），经过靠近北站、快车站和兴盛站，然后在下关火车站结束。还有一辆标有大理专线（Dàlǐ Zhuānxiàn）的巴士，从早上 6：30（5 日元，30 分钟）开始，每 15 至 20 分钟一班从西门驶过火车站。

Bus C2 (¥2, 30 minutes) travels from Caiyun Port to the northern edge of Dali Old Town and then down the western side to the west gate.
C2 路公交车（2 日元，30 分钟）从彩云港到大理老城北缘，然后从西侧下到西门。

Cang Shan 苍山
苍山

The verdant 4000m-plus peaks of the Cang Shan range (Cāng Shān) rise imposingly above Dali and offer the best managed hikes in the area. Most travellers head first for Zhonghe Temple, on the side of 4088m Zhonghe Mountain (中和山, Zhōnghé Shān), and then follow the Jade Belt Road along the contours of the mountainside to Gantong Temple.
苍山山脉 （Cāng Shān） 海拔 4000 多米的青翠山峰雄伟地耸立在大理之上，是该地区管理最好的徒步旅行。大多数旅行者首先前往海拔 4088 米的中和山一侧的中和寺，然后沿着玉带公路沿着山腰的轮廓到达甘通寺。

1Sights & Activities
1 景点和活动

Admission to Cang Shan (¥35) entitles visitors to see all the cultural and natural sites on the mountain but doesn’t include the chairlifts or cable car. It is possible to hike up the mountain, a sweaty two to three hours for those in moderately good shape. Keep your eyes peeled for elusive red pandas, which have been spotted here in the past.
仓山门票（35 日元）可以让游客参观山上的所有文化和自然景点，但不包括缆车或缆车。可以徒步上山，对于身体状况适中的人来说，需要两到三个小时的汗流浃背。睁大眼睛寻找难以捉摸的小熊猫，它们过去曾在这里被发现过。

Branching out from either side of Zhonghe Temple is the Jade Belt Road (玉带路, Yùdài Lù) a paved and easily walkable flat trail that winds along the face of the mountains, taking you in and out of lush valleys and past streams and waterfalls. From the temple it’s a nice 6km walk to the Qilongnu Pools and the middle station of the Horse Washing Pond Cable Car, followed by a further 5km south to the Gantong Temple Cable Car (感通索道, Gǎntōng Suǒdào; one-way/return ¥50/80; h8.30am-4.30pm) top station and a viewpoint overlooking the Qingbi Xi Gorge. Carry on a final 4km to the topmost section of Gantong Temple, from where you can continue down the road via Guanyin Temple (观音堂, Guānyīn Táng) and pick up a Dali-bound bus.
玉带路 （ 玉带路 ，Yùdài Lù）从中和寺的两侧分支出来，这是一条铺砌的、易于步行的平坦小径，沿着山脉蜿蜒而行，带您进出郁郁葱葱的山谷，经过溪流和瀑布。从寺庙步行 6 公里即可到达奇龙女潭和洗马池缆车中站，然后再向南行驶 5 公里即可到达感通索道 （ 感通索道 ，Gǎntōng Suǒdào;单程/往返 50/80 日元; h 上午 8.30 至下午 4.30） 的顶站和俯瞰青习峡的观景台。最后 4 公里到达甘通寺的最顶端，从那里您可以继续沿路行驶 ，途经观音堂 ， 然后乘坐开往大理的巴士。

Alternatively take the cable car (洗马潭索道, Xǐmǎ Tán Suǒdào; %872 228 9977; return ¥300; h9am-4pm) up to the Horse Washing Pond, high in the mountain range, where Kublai Khan set up his base in the late 13th century.
或者乘坐缆车 （ 洗马潭索道 ，Xǐmǎ Tán Suǒdào; % 872 228 9977;回程 ¥300; h 上午 9 点至下午 4 点） 前往山脉高处的洗马池，忽必烈于 13 世纪末在这里建立基地。

Gantong TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
甘通寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(感通寺, Gǎntōng Sì)
（ 感通寺 ，Gǎntōng Sì）

Originally constructed in the Tang dynasty, this was once the most important temple in the Dali area. Only one of the original 36 halls remains, but reconstruction continues apace and in its forested mountainside setting the atmosphere is magnificent.
这座寺庙最初建于唐代，曾经是大理地区最重要的寺庙。原来的 36 个大厅中只剩下一个，但重建仍在快速进行，在森林覆盖的山腰环境中，气氛非常壮丽。

Most notable is the uppermost temple (just uphill for visitors arriving on the stone path descending from the Jade Belt Road) for the delicate, manicured gardens and wonderful teahouse (10.30am to 6pm) inside. Pay whatever you like for the tea, leave a ¥100 deposit for the glassware, and pick a spot to relax for a while.
最引人注目的是最上面的寺庙（对于从玉环一路下来的石板路抵达的游客来说，就在上坡处），那里有精致、修剪整齐的花园和美妙的茶馆（上午 10.30 至下午 6 点）。为茶支付任何费用，为玻璃器皿留下 100 日元的押金，然后选择一个放松片刻的地方。

Qilongnu PoolsNATURAL POOL
奇龙女泳池 NATURAL POOL

(七龙女池, Qīlóngnǚ Chí)

This series of attractive pools and cascades is said to have been the favourite bathing spot of an Erhai dragon king’s seven daughters. The path up is quite steep, but worthwhile.
这一系列迷人的水池和瀑布据说是洱海龙王的七个女儿最喜欢的沐浴地点。上山的路相当陡峭，但值得。

Qingbi StreamRIVER
清璧溪 RIVER

(清碧溪, Qīngbì Xī)

Mountain spring that gushes into three basins, with an impressive waterfall during the rainy season. The combination of the clear water and the stones in the basins give the water an attractive green-blue colour that delights local visitors.
山泉涌入三个盆地，雨季瀑布令人印象深刻。清澈的海水和盆地中的石头相结合，使水呈现出迷人的绿蓝色，让当地游客感到高兴。

Zhonghe TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
中和寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(中和寺, Zhōnghé Sì)
（ 中和寺 ，zhōnghé yes）

This temple on the side of Zhonghe Mountain is small and pretty but of little note otherwise. There is a small restaurant on-site with basic dishes, plus tea, coffee and beer.
这座位于中和山一侧的寺庙小而漂亮，但除此之外没什么值得注意的。酒店内设有一间小餐厅，提供基本菜肴，以及茶、咖啡和啤酒。

Horse Washing PondLAKE
洗马池 LAKE

(洗马潭, Xǐ Mǎ Tán)

Kublai Khan used this place as a base back in the late 13th century. On a clear day, views from the cable car and pond are stunning.
忽必烈早在 13 世纪末就将这里用作基地。在晴朗的日子里，缆车和池塘的景色令人惊叹。

4Sleeping & Eating
4 睡眠和饮食

It is not permitted for travellers to stay overnight on the mountainside; the few guesthouses that once existed here have all been shuttered.
旅客不得在山腰过夜;这里曾经存在的几家宾馆都已经关闭了。

Each of Cang Shan’s temples has at least one simple restaurant, and snacks are available for purchase about halfway along the Jade Belt Road at the Horse Washing Pond Cable Car’s middle station.
苍山的每座寺庙都至少有一家简单的餐厅，在玉环一路的中途，可以在洗马池缆车的中站购买小吃。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

The starting point for numerous footpaths up Cang Shan is walking distance from Dali’s Old Town. For the most popular, walk about 200m north of the Zhonghe Chairlift base station to the riverbed and a rarely staffed checkpoint. Follow the left bank for about 50m and walk through the cemetery, then follow the path zigzagging under the chairlift. When you reach some stone steps, you’re near the top. This is but one of several paths up to Zhonghe Temple, and one of many that climbs up the mountainside.
苍山众多人行道的起点距离大理老城区仅几步之遥。对于最受欢迎的，从中和缆车基站以北步行约 200 米到达河床和一个很少有人值守的检查站。沿着左岸行驶约50米，穿过墓地，然后沿着缆车下曲折的小路走。当你到达一些石阶时，你就接近山顶了。这只是通往中和寺的几条小路之一，也是众多爬上山腰的小路之一。

From Dali Old Town’s South Gate, tourist shuttles (¥8) run to and from the Gangtong Cable Car’s lower station throughout the day. Taxis run from the old town to Zhonghe Temple Chairlift (¥15), Horse Washing Pond Cable Car (¥20), and Gantong Temple Cable Car (¥30).
从大理老城南门出发，全天有旅游班车（8 日元）往返于港通缆车的下站。出租车从老城区开往中和寺缆车（15 日元）、洗马池缆车（20 日元）和甘通寺缆车（30 日元）。

Most independent travellers hike or take a cable car up to either of the two main temples and follow the Jade Belt Road across the mountain towards the other temple, perhaps stopping at the Horse Washing Pond Cable Car to ride up to the pool and back.
大多数自由行旅客徒步或乘坐缆车前往两座主要寺庙中的任何一座，然后沿着玉环路穿过山前往另一座寺庙，也许会在洗马池缆车停留，乘坐到游泳池并返回。

Zhonghe Chairlift (中和索道, Zhōnghé Suǒdào; one-way ¥30; h9am-5pm) is the obvious choice for an early start, as it’s the closest to Dali. Gantong Temple Cable Car is less convenient to the old town, but is served by public transport. Horse Washing Pond Cable Car can be taken from the lower station (return ¥300) near the old town or from the middle station (¥140) on the Jade Belt Road near the Qilongnu Pools. The entire ride from bottom to top takes around 40 minutes.
中和索道 （ 中和索道 ，Zhōnghé Suǒdào;单程 30 日元; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）是早点出发的明显选择，因为它离大理最近。甘通寺缆车前往老城区不太方便，但有公共交通工具服务。洗马池缆车可从老城区附近的下站（往返¥300）或奇龙女潭附近的翡翠带路中站（¥140）乘坐。从下到上整个旅程大约需要 40 分钟。

Xizhou 喜洲
Xizhou 喜洲

%0872 / Pop 54,940
% 0872 / 人口 54,940

A trip to the old town of Xizhou (Xǐzhōu) for a look at its well-preserved Bai architecture is a lovely stop, and some travellers make it their base for exploring the area around Dali.
前往西州老城区（Xǐzhōu），欣赏其保存完好的白族建筑是一个不错的停留点，一些游客将其作为探索大理周边地区的基地。

Yan Family CompoundHISTORIC BUILDING
阎家大院历史建筑

(严家大院, Yánjiā Dàyuàn; %872 245 4198; Sifang Jie, 四方街; ¥25; h8.30am-6pm)

This traditional Bai-style wooden courtyard home was constructed by businessman Yan Zizheng in the early 1900s, using the fortune he made from trading along the Tea Horse Road. Don’t miss the small entrance off the 4th courtyard to the ‘No 5 Garden’, and an underground air-raid shelter. There’s surprisingly good English signage throughout the complex.
这座传统的白式木制四合院住宅是商人严子正在 1900 年代初利用他在茶马路沿线贸易赚到的财富建造的。不要错过通往“五号花园”的第四庭院的小入口和地下防空洞。整个建筑群都有令人惊讶的好英文标牌。

oLinden CentreHOTEL¥¥¥
o 菩提树中心酒店 ¥¥¥

(喜林苑, Xǐ Lín Yuàn; %872 245 2988; www.lindencentre.com; 5 Chengbei Cun, 城北村5号; d/ste incl breakfast ¥880/1480; iW)
（ 喜林苑 ， Xǐ Lín Yuàn; % 872 245 2988;www.lindencentre.com;城北村城北村 5 号 ;含早餐¥880/1480; i W ）

This traditional Bai stone-and-wood courtyard home has been turned into a very smart boutique hotel with 16 rooms, all of which are set around a courtyard, have balconies and come with antique furniture (but modern bathrooms). The first courtyard is open to curious visitors, as is the terrific upstairs terrace bar (noon to 10pm) overlooking the agrarian landscape surrounding Xizhou.
这座传统的白石木庭院住宅已被改造成一家非常时尚的精品酒店，拥有 16 间客房，所有客房都围绕着一个庭院，设有阳台，并配有古董家具（但浴室现代化）。第一个庭院向好奇的游客开放，楼上很棒的露台酒吧（中午至晚上 10 点）也开放，可俯瞰西州周围的农业景观。

Xǐzhōu Pòsū BābāYUNNAN¥
Xǐzhōu Pòsū Bābā 云南¥

(喜洲破酥粑粑; %139 8856 5525; ¥10; h9am-5pm)
（ 喜洲破酥粑粑 % 139 8856 5525; ¥10; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）

Local ‘baba’ cakes are for sale from street stalls around Xizhou, but the best we’ve tasted in town are from this friendly chef, who sets up shop just southwest of the entrance to the Yan Family Compound.
西周周围的街边小摊出售当地的“粑粑”蛋糕，但我们在镇上品尝到的最好的是这位友好的厨师，他在严家大院入口的西南方向开了店。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

You can catch a local bus (¥7, 30 minutes, 7am to 6pm) from the west or east gates in Dali. Return buses leave from the main highway on the west side of Xizhou, just south of the moon bridge.
您可以从大理的西门或东门乘坐当地巴士（7 日元，30 分钟，早上 7 点至下午 6 点）。回程巴士从西州西侧的主干道出发，就在月亮桥以南。

Nuodeng 诺邓
Nuodeng 诺邓

%0872 / Pop 1200
% 0872 / 人口 1200

In existence for over 1150 years, the anachronistic hamlet of Nuodeng (Nuòdèng) has one of the highest concentrations of Bai in Yunnan and some of the best preserved buildings in the entire province. The area has managed to maintain traditional village life, with ponies and donkeys clomping up the steep flagstone streets past traditional mudbrick buildings with ornate gates, many of which date back to the Ming and Qing dynasties.
诺登（Nuòdèng）这个不合时宜的小村庄已有 1150 多年的历史，是云南白族最集中的村庄之一，也是全省保存最完好的建筑之一。该地区成功地保持了传统的乡村生活，小马和驴子在陡峭的石板街道上行驶，经过带有华丽大门的传统泥砖建筑，其中许多建筑的历史可以追溯到明清时期。

It’s finally starting to hit the radar of both domestic and foreign tourists, but for now Nuodeng is still very peaceful and a delightful place to kick back for a while.
它终于开始受到国内外游客的关注，但就目前而言，诺登仍然非常宁静，是一个可以放松一段时间的愉快地方。

1Sights
1 景点

After crossing the bridge at the bottom of the village you’ll see one of the original salt wells, located inside a wooden shed. The town is built upon a steep hill and winding up along the alleys you’ll pass through an impressive Wooden Archway (木牌坊, Mù Páifāng) just before the final steps to the restored Confucian Temple (孔庙, Kǒngmiào), notable as one of few in China that show the sage dressed as a commoner (also check out the detailed frescoes still visible on the ceiling). Just beyond is the picturesque 16th-century Yuhuang Pavillion (玉皇阁, Yùhuáng Gé).
穿过村底的桥后，您会看到一个原始的盐井 ，位于一个木棚内。该镇建在一座陡峭的山丘上，沿着小巷蜿蜒而上，您将穿过一座令人印象深刻的木牌坊（木牌坊 ，Mù Páifāng），就在通往修复后的孔庙（孔庙 ，Kǒngmiào）的最后台阶之前，孔庙是中国为数不多的展示圣人打扮成平民的建筑之一（还可以查看天花板上仍然可见的详细壁画）。再往前就是风景如画的 16 世纪玉皇阁 （ 玉皇阁 ，Yùhuáng Gé）。

Village daily life is centred on the small market square, a good place to catch some sun and gab with the local elders.
村庄的日常生活以小集市广场为中心，这里是与当地长辈一起晒太阳和闲聊的好地方。

4Sleeping & Eating
4 睡眠和饮食

Good Life HostelHOSTEL¥
Good LifeHostel HOSTEL¥

(古道坊客栈, Gǔdàofāng Kèzhàn; %186 0125 2967; 292970620@qq.com; dm ¥50, d without/with bathroom ¥120/160; W)
（ 古道坊客栈 ，Gǔdàofāng Kèzhàn; % 186 0125 2967;292970620@qq.com;dm ¥50，d 不含/带浴室 ¥120/160; W ）

This beautiful terraced courtyard home is near the bottom of the village. Rooms are generally small and dark, but common spaces are inviting. To find it, head for the stone steps leading uphill from the bridge where rickshaws arrive and depart, and follow the signs. They can cook simple Chinese dishes, too.
这座美丽的梯田庭院位于村庄底部附近。房间通常又小又暗，但公共空间很吸引人。要找到它，请从人力车进出的桥上通往上坡的石阶，然后按照指示牌行驶。他们也可以做简单的中国菜。

Fùjiǎ Liúfāngyuàn KèzhànINN¥

(復甲留芳苑客栈; %872 572 3466; 502609@qq.com; d ¥100-120, ste ¥200; W)
（872 % 572 3466;502609@qq.com;D MLN 100-120 ， ste MLN 200 ; W ）

Expect big rooms and sit-down toilets at this friendly, family-run guesthouse set around a lush garden of bougainvillea. The new annexe offers very comfortable rooms and a terrace overlooks the village – perfect for sunrises and stargazing. It’s in the northern section of the village but a bit hard to find; call ahead and they’ll come and meet you.
这家友好的家庭经营宾馆坐落在郁郁葱葱的九重葛花园周围，拥有宽敞的房间和坐式厕所。新的附楼提供非常舒适的客房和俯瞰村庄的露台，非常适合日出和观星。它位于村庄的北部，但有点难找;提前打电话，他们会来见你。

oYánquán NóngjiāYUNNAN¥¥
o Yánquán Nóngjiā 云南¥¥

(盐泉农家; %872 552 5111; dishes ¥15-100; h11am-8pm)

The one genuine restaurant in the village is also one of the most famous in Yunnan, after being featured on the hit Chinese TV show A Bite of China. People come from far and wide to sample shúhuǒtuǐ (熟火腿; ¥40), a slightly salty cured ham that’s the local speciality. It tastes fantastic, as do the all-natural veggies and tofu.
村里一家正宗的餐厅也是云南最著名的餐厅之一，曾出现在中国热门电视节目《 咬一口中国 》中。人们从四面八方赶来品尝熟火腿 ，这是一种微咸的腌火腿，是当地的特产。它的味道很棒，全天然蔬菜和豆腐也是如此。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Buses (¥43, three hours, 14 daily, 7.10am to 4.30pm) leave from Xiaguan’s express bus station to the sleepy county seat Yunlong (云龙, Yúnlóng), from where you can take a three-wheel rickshaw or minivan (¥15 to ¥20) the final 7km to Nuodeng. Buses back to Xiaguan leave on the same schedule. There is also one daily bus to Kunming (¥175, seven to eight hours, 9.30am) and to Jianchuan (¥51, four to five hours, 8.30am), where travellers can transfer for Shaxi.
巴士（43 日元，3 小时，每天 14 班，早上 7：10 至下午 4：30）从下关的高速巴士站出发，前往沉睡的县城云龙 （ 云龙 ，云龙），从那里您可以乘坐三轮人力车或小型货车（15 日元至 20 日元）最后 7 公里到达诺登。返回下关的巴士按相同的时刻表出发。每天还有一班前往昆明（175 日元，7 至 8 小时，上午 9：30）和前往剑川（51 日元，4 至 5 小时，上午 8：30）的巴士，旅客可以在那里换乘前往沙溪。

Shaxi 沙溪

%0872 / Pop 6,000
% 0872 / 人口 6,000

The tiny hamlet of Shaxi (Shāxī) is an evocative throwback to the days of the Tea Horse Road – you can almost hear the clippety-clop of horses’ hooves and shouts of traders. It is by far the best preserved of the caravan oasis towns from the era – and the only one with a functioning market, held on Friday, when Bai and Yi villagers converge on the town to trade in goods and livestock.
沙溪（沙溪）这个小村庄让人回味无穷，几乎可以听到马蹄声和商人的叫喊声。它是迄今为止那个时代保存最完好的商队绿洲城镇，也是唯一一个在周五举行市场的城镇，届时白族和彝族村民聚集在该镇进行商品和牲畜贸易。

The village’s courtyards, wooden houses and narrow, winding streets make it a popular location for period Chinese movies and TV shows, and there are plenty of domestic day trippers visiting from Dali. However, this is still a wonderfully relaxed place where you can spend the night sitting by the river under a canopy of stars and listening to the frogs croaking in the rice paddies.
村庄的庭院、木屋和狭窄蜿蜒的街道使其成为中国古装电影和电视节目的热门拍摄地，并且有很多来自大理的国内一日游游客。然而，这里仍然是一个非常轻松的地方，您可以坐在河边的星空下过夜，聆听稻田里青蛙的呱呱叫声。

1Sights & Activities
1 景点和活动

Sideng Jie (寺登街, Sìdēng Jiē) is the ancient town street leading off the main road, running 300m downhill past an alley that leads to the Ouyang House and on to the old square – dominated by the prominent theatrical stage (古戏台, gǔxìtái) of Three Terraced Pavilion (魁星阁, Kuíxīnggé; Shiji Guangchang, 市集广场), something of a rarity in rural Yunnan. Opposite is Xìngjiào Sì (兴教寺, Xìngjiào Temple; Shiji Guangchang, 市集广场; ¥20; h9am-5pm), the only Ming dynasty Bai Buddhist temple.
寺登街（寺登街 ，Sìdēng Jiē）是一条通往主干道的古镇街道，下坡 300 米，经过一条通往欧阳府的小巷，然后到达老广场——以魁星阁 （Kuíxīnggé;石集广昌， 市集广场 ）， 在云南农村很少见。对面是兴教寺 ，Xìngjiào Temple;市集广场 Shiji Guangchang; ¥20; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）， 这是唯一的明代白佛寺。

Exit the old town’s east gate and head south along the Hui River (惠江, Huì Jiāng), cross the ancient Yujin Bridge (玉津桥, Yùjīn Qiáo), and you’re walking the same trail as the horse caravans once rode. If you look hard enough, you’ll still be able to see hoofprints etched into the rock, or so the locals claim. Ponies can be rented for ¥120 an hour by the river, if you want to ride part of the trail yourself.
从老城区的东门出来，沿着惠江（Huì Jiāng）向南行驶，穿过古老的玉津桥（玉津桥 ，Yùjīn Qiáo），您就会走在曾经骑过的马队的同一条小径上。如果你足够仔细地观察，你仍然可以看到刻在岩石上的蹄印，至少当地人是这么说的。如果您想自己骑部分小径，可以在河边以每小时 120 日元的价格租用小马。

Beyond the small old town, the main activity here is walking. The guesthouses in town have maps that can get you started and keep you busy for days, with Horsepen 46 among the best sources of information for walks to White Dragon Pool, hidden mountain lakes and quiet mountain temples.
除了小老城区，这里的主要活动是散步。镇上的宾馆都有地图，可以让您入门并让您忙上好几天，其中 Horsepen 46 是步行前往白龙潭、隐蔽的高山湖泊和安静的山寺的最佳信息来源之一。

ShíbǎoshānNATURE RESERVE, HISTORIC SITE
Shíbǎoshān 自然保护区，历史遗址

(石宝山; %872 868 6280; ¥40; h9am-5pm)
（ 石宝山 % 872 868 6280;¥40; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）

Wandering anywhere along the forested trails and stone pathways throughout Shibao Mountain makes for a pleasant day trip out of Shaxi, but the real highlights of the area are the Tang-era temples and carvings. The Shizhongshan Grottoes (石钟山石窟, Shízhōngshān Shíkū) have the most impressive concentration, most dating to the Nanzhao Kingdom and depicting the state’s political and religious life. Also worth a visit is Baoxiang Temple (宝相寺, Bǎoxiāng Sì) for fantastic views of the rolling mountains beyond Shaxi.
沿着石宝山的森林小径和石板路漫步，都是沙溪的愉快一日游，但该地区真正的亮点是唐代寺庙和雕刻。 石钟山石窟（石钟山石窟 ，Shízhōngshān Shíkū）最令人印象深刻，最能追溯到南诏王国，描绘了国家的政治和宗教生活。宝相寺（宝相寺 ，Bǎoxiāng Sì）也值得一游，可以欣赏到沙溪外连绵起伏的山脉的美妙景色。

No public transport runs here. Walk up any of the numerous trails from Shaxi in around two hours, or take a minivan to the access road turn-off 12km north of the village. You’ll have to walk the last 2km to the entrance.
这里没有公共交通工具。从沙溪出发，步行约两小时即可沿着众多小径中的任何一条走上去，或者乘坐小型货车到村庄以北 12 公里处的通道岔路口。您必须步行最后 2 公里才能到达入口。

Ouyang HouseHOUSE
欧阳楼 HOUSE

(欧阳大院, Ōuyáng Dàyuàn; off Sideng Jie, 寺登街; ¥10)

Constructed in the late Qing dynasty, this courtyard home is a superb example of three-in-one Bai folk architecture, in which one wall protected three yards/residences. Sadly, most of it is currently closed to the public – people still live here – although for a small fee you can poke your head inside for a quick look.
这座四合院建于晚清，是白族民俗建筑三合一的极好典范，其中一堵墙保护了三个院子/住宅。可悲的是，目前大部分都不对公众开放——人们仍然住在这里——尽管只需支付少量费用，您就可以探出头进去快速看看。

THE TEA HORSE ROAD
茶马路

Less known than the Silk Road, but equally important in terms of trade and the movement of ideas, people and religions, the Tea Horse Road (茶马古道, Chámǎgǔdào) linked southwest China with India via Tibet. A series of caravan routes, rather than a single road, which also went through parts of Sichuan, Myanmar (Burma), Laos and Nepal, the trails started deep in the jungle of Xishuangbanna. They then headed north through Dali and Lijiang and into the thin air of the Himalayan mountains on the way to the Tibetan capital Lhasa, before turning south to India and Myanmar.
茶马古道（茶马古道 ，Chámǎgǔdào）比丝绸之路鲜为人知，但在贸易和思想、人民和宗教的流动方面同样重要，它通过西藏将中国西南部与印度连接起来。一系列大篷车路线，而不是单一道路，还穿过四川、缅甸（缅甸）、老挝和尼泊尔的部分地区，这些小径始于西双版纳丛林深处。然后，他们向北穿过大理和丽江，进入喜马拉雅山脉的稀薄空气，前往西藏首都拉萨，然后向南转向印度和缅甸。

Although archaeological finds indicate that stretches of the different routes were in use thousands of years ago, the road really began life in the Tang dynasty (AD 618–907). An increased appetite for tea in Tibet led to an arrangement with the Chinese imperial court to barter Yunnan tea for the prized horses ridden by Tibetan warriors. By the Song dynasty (AD 960–1279), 20,000 horses a year were coming down the road to China, while in 1661 alone some 1.5 million kilograms of tea headed to Tibet.
尽管考古发现表明不同路线的一段路段在数千年前就已投入使用，但这条道路真正开始存在是在唐朝（公元 618-907 年）。西藏人对茶的胃口增加，导致与中国朝廷达成协议，用云南茶叶换取藏族武士骑的珍贵马匹。到了宋朝（公元 960-1279 年），每年有 20,000 匹马运往中国，而仅 1661 年就有约 150 万公斤茶叶运往西藏。

Sugar and salt were also carried by the caravans of horses, mules and yaks. Buddhist monks, Christian missionaries and foreign armies utilised the trails as well, to move between Myanmar, India and China. In the 18th century the Chinese stopped trading for Tibetan horses and the road went into a slow decline. Its final glory days came during WWII, when it was a vital conduit for supplies from India for the Allied troops fighting the Japanese in China. The advent of peace and the communist takeover of 1949 put an end to the road’s long history.
糖和盐也由马、骡子和牦牛组成的商队携带。佛教僧侣、基督教传教士和外国军队也利用这些小径在缅甸、印度和中国之间移动。18世纪，中国人停止了藏马贸易，这条路开始缓慢衰落。它最后的辉煌岁月出现在二战期间，当时它是印度为在中国与日本作战的盟军提供补给的重要渠道。1949 年和平的到来和共产党的接管结束了这条道路的悠久历史。

Corvus Corax 咖啡馆

(渡鸦, Dùyā; %150 5328 9386; h10am-7.30pm)
（ 渡鸦 ，Dùyā; % 150 5328 9386; h 上午 10 点至晚上 7 点 30 分）

Perhaps the best coffee to be had in Shaxi is available at this tiny cafe and roastery just south of the old town square.
也许沙溪最好的咖啡可以在老城广场以南的这家小咖啡馆和烘焙店买到。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

From Jianchuan (剑川, Jiànchuān), minivans (¥15, one hour) run to and from Shaxi from 6.30am until 5pm.
从剑川出发，小型货车（15 日元，一小时）从早上 6 点 30 分到下午 5 点往返沙溪。

Moving on, you’ll have to backtrack to Jianchuan. There are buses every 20 to 30 minutes to Xiaguan (¥41, 2½ hours) between 6.40am and 5.30pm. To Lijiang (¥28, two hours) there are six daily buses between 8.20am and 5.30pm. A daily bus to Kunming (¥168, seven hours) leaves at 9.30am, and two daily buses depart for Shangri-la (¥50, four hours) at 9am and 10am.
继续前进，你将不得不回到剑川。早上 6：40 至下午 5：30 之间，每 20 至 30 分钟一班巴士前往下关（41 日元，2 小时半）。前往丽江（28日元，两小时）每天有六班巴士，上午8：20至下午5：30。每天有一班巴士开往昆明（168 日元，7 小时）于上午 9：30 出发，每天有两班巴士在上午 9 点和 10 点开往香格里拉（50 日元，4 小时）。

Northwest Yunnan
滇西北

Northwest Yunnan is a gorgeous blend of soaring mountains, pristine lakes and dizzyingly deep gorges and valleys. This is the part of Yunnan to head to for epic hikes, whether in the shadow of the 6000m peaks around Deqin or through the impressive Tiger Leaping Gorge. But the region is also home to Lugu Hú, a vast lake that straddles the Yunnan–Sichuan border and is home to the Mosuo people, the last matriarchal society in the world. If that wasn’t enough, there are also the towns of Shangri-la, with its intriguing blend of Tibetan and Han Chinese culture, and Lijiang, a Unesco World Heritage Site that draws in both domestic and foreign visitors en masse.
滇西北部是高耸的山脉、原始湖泊和令人眼花缭乱的深谷和山谷的美丽融合。这是云南值得前往史诗般的徒步旅行的部分，无论是在德勤周围 6000 米山峰的阴影下，还是穿过令人印象深刻的虎跳峡。但该地区也是泸沽湖的故乡，泸沽湖是一个横跨云川边境的巨大湖泊，是世界上最后一个母系社会摩梭人的家园。如果这还不够，还有香格里拉镇，它融合了藏族和汉族文化，以及丽江，被联合国教科文组织列为世界遗产，吸引了大量国内外游客。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Lijiang and Shangri-la are the only places in Northwest Yunnan with airports and train stations (the railway is scheduled to reach Shangri-la in 2020), and from them you can connect to destinations across Yunnan and beyond. Lugu Lake’s new airport makes getting there far easier to get to than before, but services are limited. Buses remain the main way to get around this region; with roads winding through mountain passes, journey times can be long.
丽江和香格里拉是云南西北地区唯一拥有机场和火车站的地方（铁路计划于 2020 年到达香格里拉），从它们您可以连接到云南及其他地区的目的地。泸沽湖的新机场使前往那里比以前容易得多，但服务有限。巴士仍然是游览该地区的主要方式;由于道路蜿蜒穿过山口，行程时间可能会很长。

Lijiang 丽江
Lijiang 丽江

%0888 / Pop 70,000
% 0888 / 人口 70,000

How popular is this time-locked place? Lijiang’s (Lìjiāng) maze of cobbled streets, rickety (or rickety-looking, given gentrification) wooden buildings and gushing canals suck in over eight million people a year. So thick are the crowds in the narrow alleys that it can feel like they’ve all arrived at the same time.
这个被时间锁住的地方有多受欢迎？丽江（丽江）迷宫般的鹅卵石街道、摇摇欲坠的（或看起来摇摇晃晃，考虑到中产阶级化）的木制建筑和滔滔不绝的运河，每年吸引超过 800 万人 。狭窄小巷里人潮汹涌，让人感觉好像是同时到达的。

But remember the 80/20 rule: 80% of the tourists will be in 20% of the places. Get up early enough and you can often beat the crowds. And when they do appear, that’s the cue to hop on a bike and cycle out to one of the nearby villages.
但请记住 80/20 规则：80% 的游客会在 20% 的地方。早起，你经常可以避开人群。当它们出现时，这就是跳上自行车骑自行车前往附近村庄之一的提示。

1 景点

Lijiang Old TownHISTORIC SITE
丽江古城历史遗址

(map Google map; 丽江古城, Lìjiāng Gǔchéng; ¥80)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 丽江古城 ， Lìjiāng Gǔchéng; ¥80）

The old town is centred on busy and touristy Old Market Square (四方街, Sìfāng Jiē), with the Waterwheel map Google map (大水车, Dàshuǐchē) defining the northern edge and the lively Zhongyi Market map Google map (忠义市场, Zhōngyì Shìchǎng; 148 Guyou Xiang, 古佑巷148号; h9am-9pm) marking the southern limit (which is a good stop for a slice of old Lijiang’s trading traditions or just some afternoon street food). The surrounding lanes are dissected by a web of artery-like canals that once brought the city’s drinking water from Yuquan Spring, on the far outskirts of what is now Black Dragon Pool Park.
老城区以繁忙和旅游胜地的旧市场广场 （ 四方街 ，Sìfāng Jiē） 为中心，水车地图谷歌地图 （ 大水车 ，Dàshuǐchē） 定义了北部边缘，热闹的中义市场地图谷歌地图 （ 忠义市场 ，Zhōngyì Shìchǎng;148 Guyou Xiang， 古佑巷 148 号 h 9am-9pm） 标志着南界（这里是体验丽江老贸易传统或只是下午街头小吃的好去处）。周围的小巷被一条动脉状的运河网分割开来，这些运河曾经从玉泉泉输送了这座城市的饮用水，玉泉位于现在的黑龙池公园的远郊。

Several wells and pools are still in use around town (but hard to find), including White Horse Dragon Pool map Google map (白马龙潭, Báimǎlóng Tán; 1 Dong Dajie, 东大街1号). Where there are three pools, these were designated into pools for drinking, washing clothes and washing vegetables.
镇上还有几口水井和水池仍在使用（但很难找到），包括白马龙潭地图谷歌地图 （ 白马龙潭 ，Báimǎlóng Tán;1 Dong Dajie， 东大街 1 号 ）。 在有三个水池的地方，这些水池被指定为饮水、洗衣服和洗菜的水池。

Much of the joy of the old town is to be had in wandering small twisting lanes that open into small courtyards, hidden teahouses or tiny temples like Puxian Temple map Google map (普贤寺, Pǔxián Sì; 73 Chongren Xiang, 崇仁巷73号; h8.30am-5pm) F. Don’t stress too much about seeing it all – but do make sure to climb the flanks of Lion Hill map Google map (狮子山, Shīzi Shān; %888 510 6290; ¥35; h8am-6.30pm) at some point for sweeping views of the old town and mountains.
老城区的大部分乐趣在于漫步在蜿蜒曲折的小巷中，这些小巷通向小庭院、隐蔽的茶馆或小寺庙，如普贤寺地图谷歌地图 （ 普贤寺 ，Pǔxián Sì;崇仁巷 73 号 h ， 上午 8 点 30 分至下午 5 点）。 F 不要太强调要看到这一切——但一定要爬上狮子山地图的侧翼谷歌地图 （ 狮子山 ，Shīzi Shān; % 888 510 6290;35 日元; h 上午 8 点至下午 6.30 点）， 欣赏老城区和山脉一览无余的景色。

Black Dragon Pool ParkPARK
黑龙池公园 PARK

(map Google map; 黑龙潭公园, Hēilóngtán Gōngyuán; %888 518 8041; 1 Minzhu Lu, 民主路1号; ¥50; h7am-8pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 黑龙潭公园 ， Hēilóngtán Gōngyuán; % 888 518 8041; 1 Minzhu Lu， 民主路 1 号 ; ¥50; h 上午 7 点至晚上 8 点）

On the northern edge of town is Black Dragon Pool Park; the view from here of Jade Dragon Snow Mountain is an obligatory photo stop in southwestern China. The Dongba Cultural Institute map Google map (东巴文化研究所, Dōngbā Wénhuà Yánjiūsuǒ; Black Dragon Pool Park, 黑龙潭公园; h9am-5pm Mon-Fri) is part of a renovated complex on the hillside inside, an interesting stop for Naxi cultural artefacts and scrolls featuring the unique Naxi pictograph script.
城镇的北部边缘是黑龙池公园;从这里看到玉龙雪山的景色是中国西南部必去的拍照地点。 东巴文化学院地图 Google map（ 东巴文化研究所 ， Dōngbā Wénhuà Yánjiūsuǒ;黑龙潭公园， 黑龙潭公园 h 周一至周五上午 9 点至下午 5 点） 是位于山坡上经过翻修的综合体的一部分，是纳西文化文物和带有独特纳西象形文字的卷轴的有趣停留地。

Trails lead up Elephant Hill (象山, Xiàng Shān) to a dilapidated gazebo and then across a spiny ridge past a communications centre and back down the other side, making a nice morning hike (but bring your passport to register before you start the hike).
小径通向象山（象山 ，Xiàng Shān）到达一个破旧的凉亭，然后穿过一个带刺的山脊，经过一个通讯中心，然后回到另一边，这是一次愉快的早晨徒步旅行（但在开始徒步旅行之前，请带上护照进行登记）。

The park is included in the all-encompassing Lijiang Old Town entrance ticket, but in practice this is the only place it seems to be checked.
该公园包含在包罗万象的丽江老城区门票中，但实际上这似乎是唯一被检查的地方。

Museum of Dongba CultureMUSEUM
东巴文化博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 东巴文化博物馆, Dōngbā Wénhuà Bówùguǎn; %888 545 7517; Jiaoyu Lu, back entrance of Black Dragon Pool Park, 教育路黑龙潭公园后门口; h8.30am-5.30pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 东巴文化博物馆 ，Dōngbā Wénhuà Bówùguǎn; % 888 545 7517;教宇路，黑龙潭公园后门口 h 8.30am-5.30pm） F

The Museum of Dongba Culture houses displays on Naxi dress and culture, Dongba pictographic script, Lijiang’s old town and the dubious claim that the region is the ‘real’ Shangri-la; it’s worth a visit if you’re passing by. Find it just outside Black Dragon Pool Park’s northern entrance.
东巴文化博物馆展出了纳西族服饰和文化、东巴象形文字、丽江老城区以及该地区是“真正的”香格里拉的可疑说法;如果你路过的话，值得一游。就在黑龙池公园北入口外找到它。

Mu Family MansionHISTORIC SITE
穆家公馆 HISTORIC SITE

(map Google map; 木氏土司府, Mùshì Tǔsīfǔ; %888 512 2572; ¥40; h8.30am-5.30pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 木氏土司府 ，Mùshì Tǔsīfǔ; % 888 512 2572;40 日元; h 上午 8：30 至下午 5：30）

The home of a Naxi chieftain, the Mu Family Mansion was heavily renovated (more like built from scratch) after the devastating earthquake that struck Lijiang in 1996. Limited captions do very little to introduce the Mu family’s history, but for many the beautiful grounds are reason enough to visit. Entrance is not included in the Old Town ticket.
穆家宅邸是纳西族酋长的住所，在 1996 年丽江发生毁灭性地震后进行了大规模翻修（更像是从头开始建造）。有限的标题对介绍穆家族的历史作用不大，但对许多人来说，美丽的场地足以成为参观的理由。老城区门票不包括门票。

OLD TOWN, NEW TOWN
老城区，新城区

A Unesco World Heritage Site since 1997, Lijiang is a city of two halves: the old town and the very modern new town. The old town, a jumble of lanes that twist and turn, is where you’ll be spending your time. If you get lost (and most do), head upstream and you’ll make your way back to the main square.
丽江自1997年起被联合国教科文组织列为世界遗产，是一座由两半组成的城市：老城区和非常现代化的新城区。老城区是一条曲折的小巷，是您消磨时光的地方。如果您迷路了（大多数人都迷路了），请逆流而上，您将返回主广场。
